Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: Made my course wavy hair manageable.
Review: The Shampoo alone will soften your hair. Will have to wash twice the first time because it does break down all the old waxes you have in your hair and it will not suds up . the second wash will have lots of suds. The conditioner is very good and a little goes a long way. I love the Styling lotion that comes with this set. A small amount will keep your hair soft and manageable.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil set comes with three products: Strengthen & Restore Shampoo, Strengthen & Restore Conditioner, and Strengthen & Restore Styling Lotion. All are made with a number of wonderful oils and other ingredients that are beneficial to hair. The shampoo is a dark brown liquid with a scent that reminds me of vanilla extract, a smell I love. The conditioner is a much thicker, about the consistency of pudding, and is light brown in color. It smells different than the shampoo, but equally as wonderful. The styling lotion is a light golden color and has a consistency about halfway between that of the shampoo and the conditioner. It doesn't smell as good to me as the shampoo and conditioner do, but it's still okay. All three of these products leave my hair very soft and manageable. I like these three items not only for their ingredients, but for what they don't contain: no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, and no petrolatum. The shampoo and conditioner are each 13 fl oz (384 ml), and the styling lotion is 8 fl oz (237 ml). This set of three products currently lists for $30.11, which I consider very reasonable.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: SHAMPOO:The shampoo is pretty thin, so be careful with how you handle it. This shampoo is one of so very few shampoos that hasn’t made my hair mad. My hair actually likes this stuff. It will more likely than not become my go to shampoo for the days when I shampoo.CONDITIONER:This conditioner was alright. Not as good for my hair as the shampoo...but not nearly as icky as the styling lotion. I’ve had better and worse conditioners. This wasn’t really special in any measurable way. I doubt I would get this again. It’s not bad...it’s just also not good for my hair.STYLING LOTIONThis left my hair sticky and smelling powerfully weird. It latched onto any dust in the air that it came into contact with. This left my hair so dirty and gross that I had to wash it twice just to get everything out. That’s really saying something because I don’t really need to wash my hair that often.WOULD I BUY THIS SET AGAIN?No. I would not buy this set again. I would like to get JUST the shampoo, since it’s the only one in the set that I actually really liked.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have long, curly, chemically dyed hair that tends to get very dry if I don't use the right products on it. Even shampoos and conditioners that are advertised as moisturizing often dry my hair out.First of all, I love the SheaMoisture brand. It's great for dry hair.This particular shampoo/conditioner/styling product is wonderful.The curls you see in the picture are 100% natural. I washed my hair, used the conditioner, towel dried my hair then let it dry naturally. Then I put a tiny bit of the styling lotion to give it a little body.So, this trio is easy on the hair and brings out your natural curls.If I had really made an effort to style my hair, this product would have done a great job.Also, my hair feels very soft. The scent of the shampoo, conditioner and styling cream ( it's not a gel) is soft and subtle,  nice, not overpowering.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: As usual, Shea Moisture really shines at getting a scent that is wonderful!  This one is very pleasant smelling!  As for the products - you know, the shampoo/conditioner/styling lotion - I found that, for the price (currently just under 32 bucks), means that each bottle is about ten dollars, and for that price, you could do a bit better in quality depending on your needs if you wanted something more specific.  For us, we tend to lean more to the natural side of things, which this product, outside of the shea butter itself and some oils, is not.  The shampoo does have a nice lather and rinses easily, and the conditioner and styling lotion are equally good products - just not premium products, at least in our mind.  (Only mentioning it because they don't quite have the premium price, but are certainly close!)  Not bad stuff, would recommend to most folks.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the natural ingredients used in these products. I primarily ordered them due to the clean ingredients, but I may keep ordering them for how well they work and for the fantastic scent! They smell absolutely lovely! I would bottle that scent and wear it as perfume! The products do a great job getting the hair clean while leaving the natural moisture. My toddler has curly hair and I'm always on the hunt for products that keep her hair moisturized and yet aren't full of a bunch of sketchy ingredients. This definitely fits the bill! I love the leave in conditioner included. That is an absolute must for my daughter's hair or it just looks super dry again in no time. It really seems to seal in the moisture well.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My hair tends to be rather dry and thin/fine, so for shampoos I need something that actually delivers on promises of moisturizing. This wasn't my first go-around with SheaMoisture. I've used some of their body soaps and face cleansers before, and I've generally enjoyed each product, so it wasn't a surprise that I'd like this set of shampoo/conditioner/styling lotion as well. The shampoo and conditioner did a good job of giving my hair feel softer, fuller after a couple weeks of use. The styling lotion works, but I found the holding strength not quite enough for me. I do like the scent though, as faint and fleeting as it is.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have very curly hair that’s just past my shoulders and we have a variety of hair types in the family. Although I try to pull out from the sets the ones that are curly girl approved, not all of SheaMoisuture products are, the only one in the set is the Shampoo.I love the conditioner. I wash my hair daily but don't apply shampoo more than 1-2 times per week so it doesn't dry out my hair. The styling cream is a lite hold.I’ve used several of the SheaMoisture products and have had great success without spending a ton of money.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a really great productTHE GOOD!-really great quality-great value and price!-package with love & care-THIS IS SUCH A GREAT BEAUTY PRODUCT! I FEEL GOOD ABOUT WHATS IN THIS PRODUCT! TRULY WORKS WONDERS!! GREAT SET, WOULD ALSO WORK GREAT AS A GIFTTHE BAD :(-absolutely nothing!OVERALL!-I highly recommend this product and will continue buying this product whenever I need something similar again! Trusted product and brand!

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Generally, I do not use shampoo often because it is so drying.  This shampoo is not drying at all.  It is gentle and moisturizing.  It does have a scent but the scent is not strong and fades quickly.  The styling lotion is ok -  I need to use this with another product on my hair but I rarely can get away with a single styling product.  The more I try this line, the better I like it.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The shampoo made my extremely thick, curly hair, look and feel even thicker. I needed my husband to squeeze the conditioner bottle. No matter how hard I tried, I couldn’t get any product out. Yes, I have arthritis in one hand, but this is the only bottle I couldn’t manage to successfully maneuver.  The styling lotion was fine. No better nor worse than any other products I use.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I really love this brand.  This shampoo is great for dry hair.  It leaves the hair soft and manageable.The scent is awesome.  I have asthma so I’m very particular with scent.  This scent is not overwhelming.It doesn’t bother my asthma.This is a good trio with shampoo, and conditioner. Plus a good styling lotion for curly hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: SMELLS TERRIBLE BUT MAKES HAIR SOFT
Review: I like how nice and soft the hair came out after use of the shampoo and conditioner and lotion but the smell was so bad in my opinion, so I’m torn .. for me the smell needs to be fixed somehow and this would be a great product!

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Yes love the bundle I have used this brand for about 7 years while going natural and no complaints

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like that the scent of this set is mild as I don't like a lot of fragrance in my products. However that said, "fragrance" is one of the top ingredients in the set which can be irritating for my skin. So far I have not had any problems with itchy scalp using this product. I do choose to follow up with either hair oil or leave in conditional as my bleached ends really need it, this set alone doesn't alleviate it by itself.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am not a fan of this company and their products. They claim to moisturize and soften hair but they leave my hair dry (I have tried most of them on my natural hair). This was one of the first products I used from this company that actually made my hair soft and moisturized but it did not last long. When you dry your hair it returns to being very dry and brittle. There is a false sense that it is working but once your washing is completed you realize that it was just an illusion. This set doesn’t seem to work for me but it may work for others. There is something in it that doesn’t agree with my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Styling Lotion for Curly Hair Mixed Hair Care Regimen with Shea Butter 3 count
Title: Smells great and left my hair manageable and soft
Review: My hair is really curly and super dry and always in need of more moisture so this set from SheaMoisture has been great. The shampoo didn't dry my hair out at all and lathered up and rinsed out well. After that I applied the conditioner, which was really thick, but was easy enough to apply and I let it sit for five minutes before rinsing. My hair felt really soft after rinsing it out and after that I styled my hair with my usual products and added the styling cream to my routine. After using all of the products, my hair dried really well with much less frizz and it feels noticeably softer. It has a very light scent, nothing too intense. Overall, this is great for anyone with curly dry hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: Great product
Review: After having covid I had suffered significant hair loss 😞 the first use of this shampoo and conditioner I was amazed!  no hair falling out & wrapped around my fingers while washing with it and very little hair shedding when drying it .. my hair felt soft and laid nicely

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: Not for my hair
Review: Not a terrible shampoo but my hair remains dry after shampooing and conditioning. The leave in shampoo smells like playdough which I actually find oddly pleasant but I’ve been using for over 3 weeks 1-2 times a week and my hair still seems so dry.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: Excelente
Review: Los productos llegan muy bien empacados y sellados sin riesgo a qué se rieguen. Estoy usandolos hasta el momento me ha gustado como queda mi cabello.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I’ve been using castor oil for years and I can truly attest to the benefits this oil offers.  Black Castor Oil is a hair strengthener and combined with Shea Butter is such a great combination! So when I stumbled across these products, I had to have the collection.This Shea Moisture Strengthen & Restore collection includes 13oz Shampoo, 13oz Conditioner and also a 12oz Strengthen & Restore Masque.The shampoo with Peppermint Oil made my scalp feel tingly while my hair felt so refreshingly clean. Now both conditioners left my hair feeling so soft and shiny. My hair suffers from heat damage so it’s dry & dull. But the conditioners, left my hair feeling moisturized, more manageable and it also smells AMAZING.These products did exactly what I needed them to do so I highly recommend these products.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: Leaves my hair soft, squeaky clean, and perfectly balanced!
Review: I have used several SheaMoisture products in the past and have always been pleased with them. This set of Strengthen and Restore products sounded like they were right up my alley as my hair is fine, thin, and slightly damaged.If you have super dry hair, these may not work for you. I have combination hair (oily roots and dry ends) and don't need a ton of moisturizing. These products worked well for my hair type. If you need intense moisture, your hair may be left feeling too dry.In this bundle, you get a shampoo, conditioner, and masque. I rarely use masques because my hair normally doesn't need a ton of moisturizing but I decided to give this one a try to see how well it worked on my hair.I was intrigued by the color of these products. I'm used to white and clear colored haircare products. These are actually dark brown and like a caramel color. I have light blonde hair so always worry about color being deposited on my hair but that definitely didn't happen.All of the products smell fantastic! I can smell all of the ingredients! The end result is pleasant and fresh smelling.The shampoo lathers nicely and leaves my hair feeling squeaky clean without being stripped of moisture.The conditioner coats my hair nicely and really works into my dry, brittle ends. It was a little difficult to squeeze out of the bottle, especially as the bottle got emptier and emptier. However, it rinsed out of my hair well and didn't leave it feeling slick or coated. My hair felt so soft and hydrated. It isn't a super moisturizing conditioner and didn't leave my hair feeling weighed down after drying.The masque is something I would use once a week or so, maybe once every 10 days. I apply the product and leave it on for about 15 minutes or so before rinsing. It is difficult to rinse but does leave my hair feeling SUPER hydrated. It is too moisturizing for me to use on my roots. I tried it the first time and it left my roots feeling too oily for my liking but it works great for my dry ends!

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have thick curly hair that is prone to breakage and after using all 3 products consistently have been happy with the results. After shaping my hair is always very frizzy and dry for the next few days which has always annoyed me because I cant shape it how I want. However with the hair mask that dry hair is gone a lot quicker. It also does a great job at adding volume to my curls.  Before my hair would show signs of curling but still lie fairly flat. After only a few days of using this product, my hair has so much more volume and much better curls. I love the ingredients they use, things like castor oil and shea butter plus the products even look natural because they are brown and black just like I would expect them to be not some weird white slime. The main issue I have had is with the shampoo, one of the main things I was looking for was a product that could decrese breakage. When I use the included shampoo I feel as if I had just as much or even more breakage than I did before. As soon as I substituted it out for a different shampoo I started to notice a decrese in breakage. Obviously everyone's hair is different so I may have just been unlucky with the shampoo but the masque and conditioner still work great so I would definitely recommend trying the product out and being open to experimenting like I did to get the best results.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a pretty good product, but the "package" is where it falls down a little for me.  First - the products work as you would expect with a possible exception of the color of the stuff (not super attractive) and the texture (same).  But once using it, it gives good results and smells quite nice!  In fact, the scent is probably my favorite part.Looking at competitors - they perform just as well and come in different (and equally pleasant) scents - so one isn't really better than the other.  However, give this is a package - at the current price, each item is here averages over $8...which assumes each is equally priced, which it's not likely to be.  For me - I value some parts of this more than others.  (Also - at time of this review, the shampoo is available for exactly $4 - it says it's usually $10, but it's difficult to determine how true that may be.)  So right now, I could buy this kit cheaper separately.If you really want each item in the package it may be a great deal (maybe...), but otherwise, you may be spending a bit more for a 3rd item you may not use much.  So overall - pretty good product, could be bought individually for less expensive right now (and you'd pick all 3 items yourself)...so I'm not super fond of the package itself.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Most Shea Moisture hair care products are geared towards curly hair, and this line is one of the ones that can be used by everyone. This isn’t my first time trying the shampoo and conditioner in this set, I have used it in the past, but it is my first experience trying the masque!None of these products in the SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo smell good, they all have a weird scent that’s not horrible but also doesn’t make me want to use it. But it does do a good job of strengthening like it claims! Anyone that’s used strengthening products knows that they usually are not the most hydrating products. They tend to leave your hair feeling a bit dry and even sometimes brittle. But they do a great job of strengthening in the long run. And this set is no different.I would recommend this to anyone that has lots of split ends, or dry and brittle hair. But I also wouldn’t recommend using this set daily. I like to use this every other shampoo, this way I am getting some of the benefits, without my hair getting to dry and gross feeling.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I got this for my daughter-in-law, and the following is her review:This Shea Moisture Shampoo, Conditioner, and Masque set is a great value, priced at roughly $24.22. The products smell great as they are made with Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Shea Butter, and Peppermint to give them their fantastic scent. They are designed to strengthen and restore damaged hair and soften and improve its texture. I like Shea Moisture as a brand as they are known for formulating products that are paraben, sulfate, and phthalate-free, as well as color-safe. After using all three products in a row, my hair now feels refreshed and given its life back. The shampoo lathered well, created nice bubbles, and was a good consistency. The conditioner was great at giving my hair some moisture, but the leave-in masque was the ultimate treatment that improved my hair, making it feel softer and silky smooth to the touch. I give this product 5 stars, as it's priced well and works great for my hair care needs.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My hair is 4C natural and loves moisture.  SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque with JBCO is right up my alley.  It smells amazing.  Shampoo lathers rich once your hair is wet.  Lots of bubbles, which I love.  The mask (second pic) applies easy and you can start to see your real hair pattern.  I alternate washes with masque and conditioner.  I think the shampoo conditioning process was gentle on my hair and it came out really clean and fluffy.  Very strong too.  I had a lot of tangles, and my hair held up well to all the pulling and tugging needed to detangle.  However, after towel drying, I felt my hair was really dry.  I had to put a lot of moisture back in it.  It absorbed that moisture like a sponge.  So if you want gentle, harsh chemical free cleansing and conditioning, this kit does it well.  However, be prepared with some good leave in conditioner.  I used another Shea Moisture conditioner and I'm good to go.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: If you like the smell of shea butter, that warm and slightly nutty fragrance, you're going to love this set. You're going to love it even more if your hair is in need of some serious softening.My favorite of the trio has got to be the strengthen and restore treatment mask. Like the other products, you can easily detect that shea butter scent.As you can see from the photo, it's super thick.Great for chemically damaged hair, hair that's fried from either color or anything else that makes it feel like straw.Contains castor oil, helpful in encouraging new growth.The shampoo is clarifying, so It really gets your hair ready for either the conditioner or the hair mask.After the clarifying shampoo treatment, your hair soaks up whatever conditioning product you use. I've been using the regular conditioner everyday, and the treatment mask every few days. My hair never been so soft.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have used SheaMoisture products in the past and been extremely pleased. So, when offered this set for an honest review, I couldn’t resist. This set includes the restore shampoo and conditioner, as well as a hair masque. You use the shampoo and follow it with the conditioner. Every two weeks I follow my wash and conditioning with the masque that provides you with a deep moisturizer. These products are creamy and lather well.  They also contain shea, castor and peppermint oil. The smell is pleasant - like almonds and apple cider. This shampoo and conditioner leaves my natural hair soft, manageable, with a little shine. These products do not contain parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or mineral oil. And finally, this bundle is reasonably priced (under $28) especially if you compare the price of purchasing them individually. Overall, I’d recommend these products in terms of price and results.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Mostly happy  with this strengthen and restore hair care system.What you get:Shampoo, conditioner and hair masqueWhat I liked:- thicker shampoo that lathered well and distributed through hair- easy to apply conditioner that dispersed through my hair without issue- smells really good!-left my slightly wavy hair very easy to comb and style free from knots (blow dried straight in my photo)- left my hair very soft, shiny and smooth.- affordable priceWhat I didn’t care for:- the hair masque was disappointing. Went on very thick. Kept in my hair for 20 minutes before rinsing and was disappointed with results. My hair was more knotted and felt frizzy and drier than it did with just the conditioner.Overall happy with the product and would order again

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore set has three parts: Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque. The shampoo comes in a 13 ounce squeeze bottle. It is dark brown and resembles soy sauce. The conditioner also is provided in a 13 ounce bottle. It is much thicker than the shampoo, resembling dark mustard. It is thick enough that I had trouble getting it to come out of its bottle. The masque also looks like pale mustard. It comes in a 12 ounce tub. The three share some ingredients including Shea Butter and Peppermint, which lends itself to a pleasant scent.I have used the three sequentially in the shower; first shampoo, then conditioner, and finally the masque. The result was pretty good. My hair was clean and shiny, but on the downside, I still had the winter frizzes. A little Argan Oil is all that is needed to take care of that.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: The color in these bottles and tub is a turn off to me. I like my shampoo and cream rinse to be clear or creamy white--preferably clear. I was almost afraid this was going to change the color of my hair. However, the shampoo lathers up nicely with a white lather. The conditioner is not overly hydrating--just enough for my fine curly hair. I did not try the masque because I do not need intense moisturizing.I do like the results but the color of the product is such a turn off that this is not something I would order again. If it were not for the color, I would have rated this 4.5 stars. The Shea Moisture products are wonderful  but this ensemble is just not for me. Also, the current price of $23.49 ($27.63 minus 15%) comes to $7.83 per item.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I liked that the shampoo gave a good rich lather. It didn’t provide as much slip hoped it would. When I tried to comb through my hair with it lathered up, it didn’t easily glide through. I had to stop combing because I didn’t want to risk snapping strands of my hair. The conditioner was ok. My hair seemed more moisturized, however, it’s not the best moisturizing conditioner I’ve used. I like the mask the best out of all three of these products. The mask really seemed to deeply moisturize my hair. It left my hair looking good and my natural curls were well defined.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the natural ingredients used in these products. I primarily ordered them due to the clean ingredients, but I may keep ordering them for how well they work and for the fantastic scent! They smell absolutely lovely! I would bottle that scent and wear it as perfume! The products do a great job getting the hair clean while leaving the natural moisture. My toddler has curly hair and I'm always on the hunt for products that keep her hair moisturized and yet aren't full of a bunch of sketchy ingredients. This definitely fits the bill!

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: Great for thick hair
Review: I really like how soft this makes my hair. I love the lightness of the scent. It’s subtle and Soft smelling and I really like it. I have found I have to use it every other or every two washes and it’s perfect, other wise it make my hair greasy. The hair mask works better for moisturizing my ends. The regular conditioner does not do much for my ends at all, so I truly prefer the shampoo and the mask. If you have fine hair this might not be for you.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Generally, I do not use shampoo often because it is so drying.  This stuff is not drying at all.  It is almost like a cowash in that respect.  It does have a scent but the scent is not strong and fades quickly.  The masque does help hydrate the hair.  I ended up using a fair amount to be able to detangle my hair but this isnt unusual.  The more I try this line, the better I like it.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Our family loves SheaMoisture! The products leave hair easy to manage and looking great. Super happy with this set.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: I will have to use for months.
Review: I used the for my hair. I like this hair product it smells good.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have used several of Shea Moisture products before and have loved them all, they have great quality products and I really like this set too. In this set you get shampoo, conditioner and a masque. I hadn’t ever seen the  colors of this shampoo and conditioner before, they were a little different, they were brown color like a caramel color, I was use to using clear or white but they smelled so good and I love how much it lathered up and left my hair smelling so good and it felt so clean. It didn’t weigh my hair down like a lot of others do. My hair felt so healthy after using this set. I did try the masque once and left it in for 15 minutes before you rinse it out. It made my hair feel so clean and it had so much bounce to it,  it felt like I just came back from a salon, I really love this set and this brand and I would highly recommend!!

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 countGreat set to restore your damaged hair.My scalp and hair felt really clean after using the shampoo and conditioner and the masque left my hair less frizzy and soft.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: When I ordered this set I was under the impression from the labeling that it was produced by a small US business, possibly family owned. When I got the product I noticed it came in a box stating it is a Unilever company; the same company that owns Suave, Dove, etc. I prefer to buy from small US businesses so I feel that the marketing and labeling is a bit misleading. With that being said, I do like the set. All three smell very nice and contain mostly natural ingredients without any of the "bad stuff".  The shampoo cleanses and lathers well. The conditioner and mask do leave my hair softer, smoother without sacrificing body and volume. It is great for my mature, graying hair. But I feel like the labeling leads people to believe it is a small business when it is only "family founded". I mean Walmart and McDonalds are as well so that doesn't mean much to me when I prefer to support actual small US businesses.

Product: SheaMoisture Strengthen and Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Masque for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Care Regimen 3 count
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I find this shampoo (and others within the same brand) to be too thin and watery, doesnt work up a good lather and doesnt leave my hair feeling clean. The conditioner is just okay, but also doesnt work well for me. The worst part though is that I seem to be allergic to something that they put in their products and it makes my eczema on my hands flare up badly.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Turned my hair and hands dry and brittle.
Review: This dried the =#$-+&*@#% out of my hair!! After I rinsed it off my hands I got a clue because my hands felt so dry! They needed hand lotion!! Later, my hair was dry and brittle. Why? I have no idea! The ingredients looked moisturizing but what happened is a fact.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I am honestly pretty disappointed with this leave in conditioner. The Shea moisture formula has changed a lot over the years I thought I would give it another chance and it let me down once again. I have type 4 natural hair and this leave in did absolutely nothing good for my hair. It did the opposite of what it claimed it actually dried my hair out.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: It isn't what it used to be
Review: I think they changed the recipe. I thought this line was safe when they rebranded. It also runs more. I know theyre suppose to be considered a little inconsistent because its suppose to be natural but ive been buying this line for 9 years. Its the same if I buy it in stores. I really wanted to keep buying this line as i loved and always reccomanded it but I'll be changing my go to brand. Coconut and hibuscus line is still great.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Must Have For Curly Hair!!!!
Review: I honestly do not know how I ever survived without this product! I have curly hair and this knocks the frizz out for up to two days, although I put it in every morning, just not as much the second day! I have tried to use other products! #CantEven!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Terrible Purchase, Tangled Hair
Review: My hair became so tangled and the product left a residue on my hair that smelled. My hair was so entangled it formed knots.I had to wash it out to avoid losing any more hair.Do not purchase.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: AMAZING HYDRATION PRODUCT I ALWAYS USE IT
Review: This product keeps my hair hydrated and I am black as well as my cousin who is mixed. It keeps the hair soft and manageable. At night I sleep with a satin bonnet on my head.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: GAMECHANGER!!
Review: .. I ordered this to help bring LIFE back to my dried, fried, aging caucasian hair. ..!I have dyed and bleached my hair since i was about 14 years old. .. until I was 35.In 2020, I decided to stop damaging my hair with chemicals and to let my natural color / salt and pepper , and brunette, come through.I needed hydration. I needed protein. I needed shine!! - THIS PRODUCT DOES IT ALL!!I am so happy I gave it a try! .. works vetter than the manuka honey for my hair! My hair feels hydrated, soft, and its so shiny!! .. no more dead fried dullness! This stuff is Gold for me!!The smell is like.. Vanilla pudding.. althoigh there is a faint playdough hint... I dont mind it being thats Ill be using it as I need protein and ahine added back to my hair instead of a daily treatment. ..I am truly thankful for this stuff! I feel like its gonna change my hair healing game.. if your hair is dry, brittle, lifeless, and breaking- try this!!also,, a little goes a long way!! I have shoulder length hair,, so it may last me at least a few months if I truly use it around 1 to 2 x a week.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Absolutely love!
Review: Best leave in conditioner for my locs!!! Keeps them strong and healthy , especially after styling and maintenance. Wouldn’t dare use any other product !!!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Great for curly hair
Review: I just started properly taking care of my curls so this is my first leave-in. It works great keeping my hair moisturized and healthy but the only thing I hate is the smell. It smells like cookies dunked in apple cider vinegar--a very weird combo but it is what it is

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Not great for low porosity curly hair
Review: I have low porosity very dry hair and this product left it so oily that I thought it was going to leave stains all over my clothes and bedding. I had to wash my hair the next day. It is also suuuuuuper sticky and matted my hair. Just terrible. Overall, it’s a disgusting product that I wouldn’t recommend to anyone. The only positive thing I can say about the product is that it has a nice light scent.Of course, I don’t want to throw it away since I paid for it (and also don’t want to add to my carbon footprint), so I spoke to my stylist who told me to layer my hair with the product before I get into the pool and then the product will protect my hair from the chlorine. This is the second time that I have tried a moisturizing product besides shampoo from Shea Moisture. The other product that I had tried was the coconut and hibiscus curl enhancing smoothie. That product is also way too greasy and sticky. The only products that I can use from Shea Moisture are their shampoos. Ironically, their shampoos are excellent.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Controls frizz & softens hair
Review: My biggest regret is not trying a leave in conditioner sooner! Of course I’ve tried everything else & after watching a video on the top 5 best leave ins (this product being one of them) I decided why not give it a try? I’ve tried everything else? After one use I notice a difference in that the frizz & dryness I’ve been experiencing for years was much better & my hair was softer & more manageable when blow drying & styling. I’m going to keep using this & hopefully it’ll keep doing it’s thing!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: One of my Favorite Leave-Ins
Review: Loved this product. The scent is hit or miss with a lot of folks but I like the smell of Jamaican Black Castor. It also smells sweet but I can’t figure out if it’s a vanilla pudding scent or something else. The texture for this product is thick and a little goes a long way because it can be heavy if you are heavy handed with products. For my hair, it is best applied on wet or damp hair to get the best benefits on my 4A hair. The product is super moisturizing and the smell will linger in your hair for many days. Those who are transitioning will see the benefits because it will be a little strengthening to those tresses and will give your hair the shine and body to make it look vibrant and less damaged.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Excellent leave in conditioner!!
Review: Leaves my hair moisturized and soft. Smells amazing and I definitely got the value for my bucks. I use this along with Bella Curls curling creme. It is amazing!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Go to leave in for wavy hair
Review: I am mixed white and latino/indigenous and have had wavy hair all my life. At its healthiest my hair is a solid 2C. My hair isnt super thin but it is easily weighed down, and products made for thicker and coarser hair don't usually work for me. I'm going back to this leave in after a few stints in trying other leave ins because it just works so well. My waves become healthier and tighter, and it feels like they actually soak up this product, when other leave ins seem to create a film on my hair without effecting how moisturized it is. I have dry, damaged hair and live at a high elevation and this helps keep my hair healthy and moisturized!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Buy from the store
Review: Have used this product many times before from the store so I thought no big deal when I brought here. however, this batch smells just like clay, burned my scalp a little bit and is very watery. Not moisturizing at all! Did the process for return and they require you to return product. Please be careful because you do not know what people are doing to these products before returning. It's very easy to buy the reseal top and send to someone else.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: It does wonders for my coarse, wavy hair
Review: When I comb it through properly, it makes my whole head of hair shiny and soft. My hair can get extremely frizzy and dry at times even with other leave in conditioners and smoothing serum, I have been very impressed by this one! It really calms down the frizziness and never looks greasy, even after reapplying it the next day. I'm not wild with joy about the smell, but it is not offensive at all and being that it's a natural product the smell goes away in around 10-15 minutes. My roommate really loves the smell, so please take my opinion with a grain of salt! I have already ordered a second container of this, by the way!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Must have for curls `
Review: My hair is super curly (think 80's spiral curls) and quite stubborn.  It tends to be on the dry side and I have to use a LOT of product to keep frizz away.  I started using this about a month ago and when I got my hair colored yesterday, my cosmetologist was shocked at how silky and healthy my hair is.  Even when I don't dry my hair all the time, I still have dry ends.  I usually need weighted products to keep the volume of my hair under control but this just gives me beautiful curls.  This product combined with this hair dryer https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B086LB62WK/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o04_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1  has completely changed my morning routine and saves me a LOT of time getting ready.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: This product is great for dry, tangled hair.
Review: This is my first purchase of this leave in conditioner. This product really does moisturize my very dry medium thickness hair without making it greasy. It also is a great detangler. It leaves my hair soft and gives it a nice sheen. It also helps tame frizz. I am trying to grow my hair very long. I really believe that this conditioner is going to really help with preventing breakage. A little goes a long way. I concentrate the product from the middle of my hair length downwards, and put a smaller amount above that. The smell could be better, but it is not as bad as some people are saying. It eventually fades to what I would maybe call a musky vanilla.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS
Review: THIS IS THE HOLY GRAIL, LADIES!!!!! I have incredibly dry, frizzy kinky  hair.  This product gives me uber moisture and GLOSSSSSSSS. A little goes a lonngggg way!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Try This...
Review: I have thick naturally wavy hair.  Although after having 3 kids I have lost the thickness somewhat out of my hair because I have lost a lot due to birthing and breastfeeding. This product has helped with the overall restoration of how my hair “used to be before having children.”  The value is awesome because you get a lot for your money as a little bit will go a long way.  The scent smells amazing also. It is a light vanilla like smell but not like whoa overwhelming.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Breaks hair off
Review: Made my hair and grandson hair fall out, look just like we cut our hair in patches. This use to be a great product. I have a good mind to SUE!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I finally found something that leaves my hands and hair soft - without silicones! My hair is naturally grey but i color it, leaving it frizzy, dry, and out of control. All the condioners I was using, left my hair just as dry, and made the skin on my hands very dry. This leaves my hair and hands so soft. I let my hair air dry. My grand daughter was stroking my hair and said "Mimere, your hair is so soft. It used to be so rough". I recommend it to my sister and my friends

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Too Heavy for my hair
Review: I was excited to try this based on the reviews. Unfortunately, it's way too heavy for my thin damaged hair. Left it feeling so weighed down and super greasy. Tried again with an even smaller amount, the same result. I usually use a leave-in spray conditioner. Going to go back to that instead. All fine hair is not the same.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oul
Review: Shea is a leave-in moisturizer that has saved my over processed, brittle hair.  In addition to damage from chemicals, my hair is naturally wavy & frizzy.  My hair is now stronger, healthier, & shinier as a result of using Shea.  I have been using this product for at least two years.  I highly recommend it for anyone who has dry, damaged,  brittle, frizzy hair or just wants healthy, shiny, manageable hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: I use this product differently
Review: As a leave-in, this product is too heavy for my 2c fine curls, but it works GREAT as a deep conditioner. I use it after shampoo and conditioner, leave it in for a few minutes, wash it out, and my hair is moisturized for days! If you feel it's too heavy for your hair, try it this way and see what you think. I also hate the smell so washing it out is good for that too :)

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: So far so good
Review: Cant say much just received

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Formula has changed
Review: I used to love this leave-in conditioner. I have 3b-3c hair and would only use this by itself since it had a liquid consistency that when dried left a cast. It was almost like a gel leave-in. Unfortunately, now the formula has changed so it’s much thicker and lighter in color and it has more of a cream consistency. I have to use it in combination with a gel but it’s still a good, and it is great for detangling.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Awesome product
Review: Awesome, one of the best leave in conditioner. Curls are soft and shiny perfect for daily use.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: The BEST moisturizer! 🙌
Review: Highly recommend, this is a GREAT moisturizer, especially for dry or dull hair.  Leaves hair super soft, shiny, smoothes out frizz and smells very fresh and soft with a faint smell of coconut but not strong at all.  Oh and it's not greasy...so, if you apply with wet hair, then leave to dry, it won't dry greasy.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: I dont understand
Review: This was a great product, an amazing well thought out product gifted by the amazing natural ingredients perfect for the hair for once, Then it disappear out of nowhere when I finally found it it got pricier by almost 3.00 and the ingredients are not the same. The smell tell me all, together with the consistency.  Why would the company do that???!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: DON’T DO IT!!!!!
Review: You guys if you have thick hair I would not suggest this at all it initially I got it & off bat it smelled like play dough I got multiple comments about the smell being bad also it did nothing for my hair when applied it was wet so I thought it would moisturize and settle in after 10min my hair was dryer than before and a lot of breakage over the time using over idk what this is but it’s horrible

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Great moisture for my hair
Review: Sheamoisture is always my favorite goto hair product. I trust the brand, I trust the product and my hair is happy.  The scent is amazing, I really like it. I keep my hair braided and I just apply a small amount over the plats during the week, until I'm ready to takedown.  Well known and safe hair care product.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: SMELLS LIKE CIGARETTES IN A TUB
Review: I was so excited for this because of all the great reviews until I opened it. Never mind that the package leaked, the real issue is the smell. As soon as you open the jar, a pack of cigarettes smacks you in the face. I couldn’t believe it was supposed to be that bad so I went to a drugstore and yep, that’s what they all smell like. I’ve used it twice but can’t focus on the product’s effectiveness because the scent lingers on my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: She Moisture Rocks Natural & Color Treated Hair
Review: Being back in a chlorinated pool, my hair is impacted swim cap or not. I am not glueing a cap to my skin, my skin would come apart. So leave in conditioner is back. I like Shea Moisture products. I do dilute the shampoo & conditioner, very fine hair here. The leave in conditioner, I apply to the dry frizzy ends only. Very nice results.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Horrible
Review: Horrible! Never had issues with my hair until I used this! Makes hair dry, brittle and causes breakage!!!! I wish I never used it!!!! I threw it away! It only took 3 days and I started to notice so much drying 😞 and breakage 😫

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Smells Like Play Dough, but has Great Slip
Review: I love the slip and ease it brings to detangling. Not a fan of the smell as it smells like play dough and not like any of its ingredients. It is taking me a while to get through and I have been using a generous amount, so that’s a good sign. Overall, I may buy it again if I don’t decide to try something else, but I’m liking it.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Simply Efficient and luxurious
Review: It's been so difficult for me as a 4c girl with picky hair to find a good moisturizer and I must commend that I have found it. This moisturizer is the bomb, it is not too thick or heavy, the scent is not too overpowering and most importantly it is very moisturizing, keeps your strands moisturized for days. I will definitely be purchasing more of this.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Irritating to Skin
Review: Worked well to moisturize my hair, but the skin on my neck that touched my hair was super dry, red, and irritated after using it just once. I saw a review that said one ingredient in this, Behentrimonium Chloride, is toxic above 0.1%. I'm thinking this is why I had such a bad reaction. It's been a week and my skin is still not recovered.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Seems to work, don’t like the smell
Review: So far this seems to be doing the trick for moisture. I’m trying to play with the amount I use because I have thin, wavy hair so my first few applications have left me hair greasy. It’s the scent for me. My goodness it smells exactly like play dough and I’m struggling with that.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: happy customer
Review: my ordered got loose but they were able to get me a new one.  great customer service. i referred this product to other black women or black girls who is trying to growth their hair. i used it in my hair and my daughter hair

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: The only brand I'll use on my hair. Thin frizzy hair has completely changed!
Review: I have thin frizzy hair and this keeps the ends from tangling. My hair has completely changed since using this product, longer sleeker and neater. I love that the brand is one I can stand behind--even though they sold to a major corp it seems like the product integrity & quality & ethical sourcing has been maintained.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: A little bit goes a long way!
Review: I can feel the difference that this product makes in my hair, it feels stronger and I have less breakage. But a word of caution: only use a little bit, because it goes a long way!! It's easy to apply too much product which leaves my hair feeling damp and goopy until I wash it out.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Wonderful product
Review: I love and use many Shea moisture products and they are all great. This one has an amazing smell and it is great for my hair. I have natural wavy, oily hair and don't use products or heat treatments on it. Highly recommend anything made by them. I have yet to have a bad experience with a product from them.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Eh
Review: Not “sheer”. This is not too thick... also not watery. I suppose it’s moisturizing. It feels like an “eh” experience for me. By itself, it’s nothing to write home about. The smell isn’t really pleasant. It kind of smells like clay to me.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Love this product. Ready to buy more
Review: This made my hair so soft and love the way it smells.My daughter absolutely loved it!  She uses it everytime she comes over so it's not lasting as long but will have to buy again soon.I also purchased the shampoo and conditioner and they are really changing my hair texture making it so soft.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: Requested a refund a soon as I opened it.
Review: Didn't have a chance to use it.  It arrived with the inner cover not affixed.  Can't tell if it was used or tampered with or not and it did not smell right to me.  My husband said it smelled like play-do.  But I did get my refund.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave In Conditioner for Over-Processed, damaged hair 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Soften and Detangle Hair 11.5 oz
Title: I love this leave in
Review: Jamaican Black Castor Oil is my favorite products of this line.  It's good to clarify your hair once a month  or so.  The treatment mask is very good to use on low porosity hair with heat.  Your hair feels soft and manageable, even though my hair is natural, this can be used on any hair type.
