Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!  I have been using this leave-in conditioner for at least 4 years now and it is hands down my absolute favorite.  I have fine thin hair that has a slight natural wave to it and I had a hard time finding a leave-in conditioner that provided good moisture without leaving my hair greasy or weighing it down.  This stuff exactly what I needed.  I divide my hair into two sections and use a small starting at the ends and work it up to about halfway.  I always let my hair air dry and this does a great job of providing moisture and also seems to add a bit of volume.  The smell is very nice, subtle and not overwhelming.  I would say a jar lasts me about half the year.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil had me a little worried when I first opened it.  It smelled good right away but I noticed the seal had been ripped and that the white cover you peel off when you open it wasn’t glued on to the top.  I’m giving it the benefit of the doubt that the heat had caused this to occur but it did make me nervous to use it at first.  Just something for them to consider improving on.The product itself is interesting.  I was imagining more of a Shea coconut butter feel to it.  It has somewhat of that texture but a little more oil feel to it when it’s applied.  On my skin, it didn’t really absorb the way typical shea butter does.  It did moisturize my skin though but it left a little bit of that oily feel that didn’t quite dry.  I guess there’s a bit of a personal preference element to this product too.  I felt that it left my skin and particularly my hands too oily feeling.  I also used a very small amount so a little goes a long way with this product.  If this is a type of product you use often this jar will last a long time.  You can easily do your arms and legs with a small dab of it.The scent reminds me of vanilla and coconut.  It’s subtle once applied to your skin.  You certainly feel well moisturized after using it.  I just wish it soaked into my skin a little more than it did.  I think the price is decent for the amount of product you get.  Like I said though it’s a little suspect that the tamper-proof seal doesn’t seem to stay glued to the top when you first get it.  That is something I would highly recommend is reworked on this product just so the consumer can feel more confident in the product being safe.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: This made my hair fee! Really dry after application.
Review: I washed my hair with my usual professional salon brand shampoo and then applied this leave in to my towel dried hair.  I allow my hair to air dry and I wonder if that could be why my hair felt like straw once it finally dried completely.  Normally a leave in conditioner will make my hair feel so soft once its fully dried, almost too soft.  But that wasn’t the case here.I pretty much avoided my roots entirely when I applied this but found that my hair just 2 days later was greasy from root to end.  Which is not the norm for me at all (I can usually get by washing my hair just once a week, twice is an indulgence).I have long, black hair that is kinda wavy, kinda straight which I color monthly (roots only bc of those pesky gray buggers!).My hair has a tendency to feel dry/frizzy when I use products that don’t suit my needs.I won’t give up on this leave-in because I have had good results with this brand in the past.  I think I just need to find the right concoction to make this work for me.  Maybe a different shampoo or actually heat styling my hair would make a diff.I have to say that when I first opened the jar I was like OMG this smells so good!  Then when I applied it to my hair, the smell brought back memories of play time and blue playdoh (not a good thing).  But the smell did not linger.  It had zero smell shortly after application which IS a good thing.  It would be a total deal breaker if my head smelled like playdoh all day long.I hope my humble opinion has helped you in some way.Thank you for reading.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have long thick wavy box-dyed hair for reference. This leave-in conditioner is really nice, but takes some figuring out. I had a lot of trial and error before I landed on the right amount for my hair. I found that applying this conditioner to my damp hair was a little too risky. It’s easy to go overboard. I don’t know why the instructions say to apply a generous amount. When I did that, things always ended badly. Rather than scoop some out of the tub, I just tap my fingers in and use what sticks to my fingers. Focusing mostly on the ends and then brushing my hair to spread it around. If I try to spread it around with my fingers, it just ends with me using too much and having oily looking hair that looks like it needs to be washed. I really found that I had the most control with this conditioner when I applied it to my dry hair. So I apply a little bit while my hair is damp, and then go in with the rest after my hair has dried. It does a nice job of smoothing out frizz and tackling dryness. One more thing that I want to note is the scent. I was a little worried about the apple cider vinegar and peppermint, but I can’t smell them at all. I mostly just smell shea butter and it’s pretty mild. This isn’t a leave-in conditioner that will overpower the senses or compete with perfume. I’m really happy with this product now that I have figured it out for my hair type, but it did take a bit of learning before I got my desired result. And at the rate I am going through it, this tub will last me a very long time. Overall, it’s a very nice leave-in conditioner…just go light!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have naturally curly hair, and it can be unmanageable at times, which is very frustrating. I recently got it cut, and the hairstylist recommended that I invest in a good leave-in conditioner, which should make my curls more manageable and cut down on the frizz. I have been a follower of Shea Moisture for years and have tried other products from them, so I figured it was worth it to give their leave in conditioner a try - and I am so glad I did!This product has a firmer consistency than some of the 'smoothie' products I have tried - I appreciate this because it's easier to put on and doesn't make as much of a mess. The jar is generously-sized, as well. I use a generous portion, but since I have shoulder length hair, it's not a ton. I work it through my hair and then let it air dry.It definitely makes a difference. My curls are more manageable and less unruly. I am much happier about the looks and definition overall. I highly recommend giving Shea Moisture products a try. The ingredients are more natural, it is very easy on my sensitive skin, and they really do work. They are worth the money!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: First of all, I love the smell of this conditioner. Normally, I’m not fond of scented products, especially if they have even a hint of artificial fragrance as those trigger headaches. This conditioner, though, has a wonderful, natural scent that I like so much, I find myself opening the container just to sniff it. Trust me, that never happens. The scent is sort of vanilla, but not overly so, with just a hint of peppermint. On to the conditioner itself. The first time I used it I took the instructions to apply a generous amount too literally and ended up with far too much in my hair. It left a heavy, greasy feel; however, my hair styled well and had an incredible amount of volume. The next time I used less, still enjoyed the benefits of conditioned hair and lots of volume but without the greasy feel. I’ve learned I don’t have to use very much, even on my thick hair, so the tub is going to last a long time. I love this stuff!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This has a very strong scent that my husband and I decided was ‘waffle cones.’ It’s not bad, but it’s kind of strange to feel like I smell like that. I used a scented mousse but couldn’t smell it at all because this product dominated it.  It is a great moisturizer, though, and makes my hair feel really soft. I’ve used this company’s Curl & Style Milk and like that scent, so it’s too bad they didn’t use that. That other product is really difficult to get out of the bottle, though, so I do appreciate this tub. It is large (20 ounces) and should last awhile. It weighs my curls down a little, so I don’t think I’ll use it every time, but I can definitely feel that it’s softer, whether I braid or curl it. I can even tell when it gets wet that it’s more moisturized. I like it and recommend it, even over the better smelling style milk (I’ll just use a perfume or something).

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This makes me sad, as I am a Shea moisture fan, lover, and user.The container is very large.  The conditioner is a bit soupy , I feel to be in such a large, wide mouth container.I had very high hopes of the leave in conditioning my hair, softening, protecting.Using on damp hair, it spread well, seemed to absorb at first, and needing more .Seemed to be softening, but later when I wnet to scrunch a bit after hair dried, it wasa weird greasy yet hard feeling. Not crunchy, more like hardened grease.Looking at my ends later, they kept tangling and locking, and I could see breakage.I use oils, balms, and leave ins - but never really experienced something that starts out good ,and turns into zapping my hair.Maybe too much castor oil ??Sorry S.M.  this did not do it for me  :(

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Smooth thick consistency and a very mild scent. You get a nice size tub of it, 11 oz. Conditioner has Jamaican black castor oil in it plus peppermint, apple cider vinegar and organic Shea butter. You can smell the apple cider vinegar in it. Smells nice, very mild, not overpowering. Consistency of the conditioner is good, melts into the hair nicely. Ingredients look natural and the conditioner contains no sulfates, parabens, mineral oil, phthalates or glycol. Also no animal testing. Black castor oil has omega 3's in it, the peppermint invigorates the scalp and the Shea butter moisturizes nicely. I enjoyed using it- it feels good on, I like the result and it's all natural. You get a lot and a little goes a long way. Overall, a good conditioner.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a large jar of leave in conditioner. It’s easy to scoop out and apply to the hair. The top unscrews so every last bit can be used without wasting any like in a squeeze bottle. I leave it beside the tub so when my little girl is done with her bath I put some on her ends that tangle easily. It’s softening and absorbs well in her hair. The scent is soft and smells like vanilla to me. It’s sweet and pleasant. Even after her hair has dried, you can still smell the leave in conditioner.  I also like to run her large tooth comb through her hair with the product in to really help cover all the strands. I have been pleased with the moisture this puts back into the hair. It makes it silky smooth and smell lovely.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: When it comes to the SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Leave-In Conditioner, 11 Fluid Ounce I really don't care for the smell.  This is more moisturizing than the other JBCO leave-in by SheaMoisture, but just barely.  I would say its just not moisturizing enough even in an optimal setting with my hair.  I could have clean hair that is misted with warm warm and my hair doesn't feel moisturized enough with just this.  I still have to use it with other conditioners and lotions.  My hair felt dry after I took my twist out down.  The twist out itself was OK, not the best, but not the worst, but my hair was just so straw like.  I wanted to wash my hair again and start over with something else.  I have 4C Low Porosity hair.  I didn't check the ingredients to see if this is actually good for low porosity, but you live and learn.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: Fantastic cream for my fine, flyaway hair!
Review: This Shea Moisture leave-in conditioner is my new must-have hair product! I have baby fine, shoulder length, straight hair. I color my gray (which is probably about 75%) so I have the added problem of flyaway, quirky gray hairs that stick out at weird angles. I have been searching for a product that tames my hair without weighing it down, and I have found it!First, on opening the generously-sized jar, I noticed the delicious fragrance! The natural ingredients combine to give this an almost cookie-like scent! It’s a really nice experience to smell this every day while I style my hair.The directions say to use a “generous amount.” I took this advice and used about 1/2 ping pong ball size the first time. Oops, much too much! This made it hard to dry my hair, and made my hair feel coated and look slightly greasy. It washes out easily and entirely. So, the next morning, I tried a fingernail-size dab. Perfect!I’ve been using this leave-in conditioner daily and have reaped several benefits. It does do what I have been searching for by taming the flyaway grays to the extent that it can. My bob style stays smooth and lasts longer. Fine side hairs don’t fly in my face nearly as often. My hair looks shiny and smooth and feels really healthy. I have a small area of ends that are heat damaged, and a tiny bit extra of this cream smooths this area and makes it unnoticeable.SheaMoisture has created an amazing cream that I will be buying on repeat!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I prefer this leave-in over the lotion. This is lightweight & leaves my hair every moisturized. I could go about 2 days without having to reapply any additional product in my hair, which is what I do on weekends. I don’t seem to need as much when compared to the lotion. I apply this after washing my hair & do not need to apply any other product in my hair except gel/mousse to my edge to prevent flyaway.MoistureIt moisture my hair very well & I don’t need to add any other oil or moisturizer. It also allows me to go longer (a week) before washing my hair. I use to wash my hair everyday to every other day. My hair feels moisturized without feeling greasy or oily.ScentThe scent is lighter than the lotion which can be unbearable. However, the scent is much lighter in the leave-in conditioner which I can tolerate & even enjoy as it’s light.BuildupI do not use this on my edge as I use gel as I find it doesn’t play nice with other products. If I put this on my edge & then apply gel, my hair gets white & flaky from product buildup.OverviewGreat moisturizer with a light scent. You do not need addition products in the hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I haven't been using this product for very long, but I am so impressed with the first couple of uses. First off, it smells so, so good - like a sweet smell that's somewhere between coconut oil, cocoa butter, and vanilla (it doesn't smell very strongly though, and the smell is totally gone once it dries). My hair honestly looks shinier and healthier than it did a few days ago when I started using this. I have pretty thin, caucasian hair, and using a dab on the lower half of my hair (mostly on the ends) is the perfect amount for me. I don't put any on my scalp since I don't want it to look oily. It really seems to have made a difference for me in the few days I've been using it, and I have tried a LOT of products with this same desired effect. I really like this product so far.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: Healing in progress
Review: I have to say this product has shown some great changes in my hair so n just a weeks time. I have biracial hair that it naturally curly. Well From time to time I flat iron it to get that lengthy ponytail. I try to be careful and use a setting of no more than 370 degrees. Well when I wet my hair, I noticed that I got my Shirley temple curls BUT about the last 3 inches of my ends were “Spidery”. I think I burned by accident. The rest of my hair had pretty curls but dead straight and stiff at the ends. I got this product and in a weeks time, my natural curls are coming back when I wet my hair. Only about the last inch is still in need but even that’s softer now. It truly does restore🙂

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is one of my favorite conditioners. It has good ingredients and never disappoints us.I and my daughter have type 4b hair. I put this in after washing and conditioning, then follow up with an oil to seal in the moisture. It leaves our hair soft and manageable.It has a sweet smell that's something skin to bananas, except that I usually hat e the smell of bananas so it has to be something else.... Idk.This big tub will last us a long time.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: Hair loss and damage
Review: I’ve used this product for many years and never had a problem, until this purchase. It made my hair ROCK hard, tangled, and even after I stopped using it I still have severe breakage.My oldest daughter loved it and she used it. Took out all of her hair on one side of her head! Trash.Now we both have bald spots where there weren’t any before and doing deep conditioning to get our hair back to it’s normal state.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This leave in conditioner is fairly ok. The jar is a decent size and the scent is nice. However, It is not the best I’ve used. It doesn’t have as much slip as I would like. On a scale from 1-100, where 100 is enough slip, I’ll give this a rating of about a 69. It just seems like something is missing or the proportions are off or something. I prefer to use it along with other products to help fill in that gap. Because of that, I don’t plan to make any future purchases.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: We're really liking this leave-in. We're a family of black, white and mixed and it's been working great on each of our hair types. For first use I'd suggest starting with a small amount. It's thick but very moisturizing and a little can go a long way…especially on damp hair but you can of course apply it on dry hair. We've been putting it in our daughter's hair before bed and again in the morning and it helps make the styling process much easier.Scent-  smells good, like a mild mix between shea and cocoa butter. If you've ever smelled raw shea butter it usually has a strong smoky scent-  this is much more mild and pleasant.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: Smells like playdoh, gross
Review: I washed my hair and applied as directed. First thing I noticed was that it smelled like playdoh. After a 5 days it still smells like playdoh. I just bleached my hair and I was looking for a leave-in that moisturizes. Well my hair looks dull my ends are still dry looking (I know there’s no fixing that without a cut but some products can mask that) AND on top of everything I woke up one morning with the biggest knot I’ve ever had in my hair. My hair is wavy and does not usually knot. I’ve had my hair bleached for weeks now and I never had a knot like that until I used this product. I will continue to use since I did spend money on it and give it another try. But that playdoh smell might make me throw it out.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have been using this for YEARS because I need a leave-in conditioner for my thick natural hair, so I was happy to see it available in a larger size. I use this after washing and before twisting or braiding and it makes my hair so soft and easy to comb through as I detangle. It smells great and has saved my hair from tons of breakage and is a staple in my natural hair care regimen. If you have 4C hair this is definitely the leave in conditioner for you.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I've used this product in a more lotion consistency before.  This is pretty much the same only in a tub version.  To be honest, I feel like the bottle version is cleaner to apply  - rather than sticking my fingers into a tub.  But, it works very very well for my hair and I typically put it on my hair right after my shower so I shouldnt worry too much.  It helps cut down on frizz and keeps my hair soft.  It has a very mild unoffensive scent.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I absolutely love the scent of this leave-in conditioner. I am a big fan of Shea Moisture products and this one is no exception. I am mixed (black and white) and have very thick curly hair. I use this to help keep my hair conditioned and soft. My local store is almost always out of Shea Moisture products every time I go so I appreciate that I can just order it online. It's not cheap, but it does last me a while. The amount you use just depends on your hair. I have to use generous portions because  my hair is thick and long. Others may be able to use less. Overall, would recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I'm very impressed with this! I always use the same brand/scent conditioning mask and love it. So I was excited to try the leave in conditioner. I was surprised by the watery consistency. I put it on after towel drying my hair and left my hair to dry naturally. I was worried it would make my hair too straight and take out the curl, but it didn't at all. It smoothed the frizz and left really nice curls!! Love it-highly recommended!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: NOT THE SAME PRODUCT!
Review: Buyer beware! This product is NOT what it used to be. Originally, the 11oz JBOC leave in conditioner was very similar to the OG formula that used to come in the 16oz tub. My most recent batch, however, was NOTHING like the batch from 2018. The product used to be runny, but now it's borderline watery.  As a 3c/4a curly girl,my roots are often frizzy. The product that USED to make them shiny and wavy with hold only makes my hair brittle and undefined. Shea Moisture has pulled a Shea Moisture and changed the formula AGAIN. The ingredients list looks the same, but that doesn't mean anything. The ingredients can appear in the same order, but there could more or less of something. Do NOT buy. It's not the same anymore.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really like how well this softens and keeps my hair moisturized. I have kinky hair and apply it while wet after washing and conditioning my hair. When my hair dries it feels softer. I also apply it when dry and it's great for smoothing my edges when they start to get dry. I like this a lot better than using gel. It has a very nice scent and isn't greasy or heavy on the hair while providing good moisture.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: Soft hair without feeling weighed down
Review: This leave-in conditioner is great for me, I have naturally curly hair and without using leave-in conditioner after washing my hair it would be impossible to brush through. This conditioner smells amazing and makes my hair so soft without weighing it down. That's usually the problem I have with any type of conditioner, they can weigh my hair down. This one thankfully doesn't do that.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a fairly thick cream leave-in conditioner that is slightly off white in color.  The scent is soft and pleasant.  There are no silicones/dimethicones/parabens/sulfates in this, so it's exactly the type of product I want for my very curly hair.  I use a very large dollop (covers the center of my palm) for my curly hair that is past my shoulders.  I add a little more to the ends after I work the first dollop through my hair with my fingers.  This leaves my hair very soft, but not sticky or greasy.  I highly recommend this for curly hair.  I like this better than the "D. C." brand name of leave-in I usually use.  This is more economical for me as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This reminds me of Queen Helene Cholesterol Cream.  But it is thinner and supposed to be leave in while the Queen Helene Cholesterol Cream is rinsed off.  I think it does nourish your hair but because it has a thicker cream consistency that you leave in, it does weigh your hair down.  As a result you really would not want to put too much on your hair or use it everyday.  It is good every so often for a deeper treatment.  Another this is that your hair also looks a bit greasy with it on.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a really large container of leave in conditioner.I was pleased and surprised by the size of the jar.This is a nice consistency for a leave in.It reminds me of a medium consistency conditioner.To me the smell is like marshmallows or vanilla.It has a sweet scent but it is not too sweet.I like the way it smooths my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This has made my hair super soft! While my hair is not overly damaged it is very coarse and dry in sections and coloring has definitely taken a toll over the years. This is pretty amazing. It smells very natural with a hint of peppermint - I wash and condition my hair then apply this and put a shower cap on and leave it for a few hours (while I clean etc) and sometimes overnight.After rinsing it out my hair is so much more manageable and softer!

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My hair likes this stuff fine...it’s just the smell is a bit weird. It smells a little like playdough. It’s...certainly different, but far better than some of the heavily perfumed crap that is in other products.Helps keep my hair soft, shiny, and reasonably happy.Just make sure you don’t use too much.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Wow wow wow! My hair is naturally curly, but it's also dry as a dessert and I've been trying to find a product or the combination of products to bring back the curl. I accidentally left a protein mask on too long and even my most moisturizing mask couldn't keep my hair from being crispy after I showered, but this stuff!!! I put it on as thick as I dared and hoped for the best. My hair came out feeling amazing and even had a little hint of a curl. It smells very nice, like cocoa butter with the hint of mint and herbal, the scent faded once it dried.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: works well for me but has a terrible smell
Review: This stuff works well, I use it right out of the shower when my hair is still pretty wet. I put it all over and when my hair dries my curls keep their shape and my style stays in place. I will say that my day 2 curls are wearable but they don't look great. Also, it doesn't leave my hair feeling crunchy. The smell is TERRIBLE smells like an ashtray! The smell definitely doesn't stay once my hair is dry, it fades to a subtle smell, not at all like the ashtray smell straight out of the tub.

Product: SheaMoisture Leave In Conditioner Conditioner For Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil To Soften and Detangle Hair 20 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have fine, frizzy, chemical treated and colored hair, so I'm always looking for a good deep or leave-in conditioner. First of all, this is hands-down the absolute best smelling hair product I've ever tried. It's not a chemical smell, it's a wonderful fresh natural smell. Using this as a leave-in is a bit too much for my hair type - my hair also gets greasy easily and this exacerbates that. However, it is excellent as an overnight conditioner! It makes my hair incredibly soft and manageable.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Regrows hair
Review: Shea Moisture really regrows hair better that any other product. I use the Jamaican Black Castro oil shampoo, conditioner and masque. It's for all hair types. My stylist says she has never seen anyone regrow hair as fast as me and for me to keep using. I already had thin hair, but was losing hair due to a medical condition. She always comments about how thick my hair is getting. I would highly recommend this product for anyone losing hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: LOVE WHAT THIS HAS DONE FOR MY HAIR
Review: I have been shopping around for a lot of deep conditioners/hair masques (they are the same thing if you were wondering), and for me, this has produced the best results for my hair. I have used deep conditioners that have damaged my hair, produced no change in my hair, and have produced positive results for my hair. This one reigns supreme in my particular case. I have medium porosity hair, which leans towards the dry side. I use this once a week, for half an hour. I recommend putting a plastic shopping bag or similar item over your hair while you let the product work it's magic. This will trap the heat in your head and hair which will open up your hair (similar to how heat opens up your pores on your skin) and allow the product to enter your hair better. My hair has become softer, visibly more moisturized, and it maintains it's curls much better (I am someone who is trying to make my hair curlier using natural products). Use this product consistently for several weeks (along with a leave in conditioner) and you will notice an improvement in your hair. I will say this, I find the scent of this product to be very pleasant, however, the smell is definitely reminiscent of play-doh. Do kids still play with play-doh? It is a milder scent, and if you use other hair products like leave in conditioner, you will most likely not be able to smell it after you wash it out. But I guess if your nose is extremely sensitive to any semblance of play-doh, then you may need to pass on this amazing product.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Holy heck, YES!
Review: I bought this for myself as I'm on that skin&hair track~ but my partner needed it more so I used it on them first. It's AMAZING. For some background--my partner has extremely THICK hair and bleaches semi-regularly. Their hair was starting to feel very dry with some elastic-y parts. I covered their head in this shiz and left it on for a few hours (not even a full night) and now their hair is SO soft and the elastic feeling is ENTIRELY gone, and the frizz is almost entirely gone.In addition to that, it smells amazing. It's thick and a little off-putting to handle with bare hands and if you have really thick hair I'd recommend wetting your hair first and pinning it up after.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Wonderful product, terrible smell...
Review: This masque works wonders. It would have been given 5 stars but the smell is very off putting. If you can forgive the playdough smell then it's wonderful! Sorry the color balance is off in the after pictures, I had 3 different lights on. I see a difference in volume and definition. My husband used the word "silky" when I asked for his opinion. I will continue to use this as needed to help my itchy scalp and damaged hair that comes with cold Michigan weather.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz

But definitely different in color, texture, and smell. It may work the same or better, but I was thrown off by the difference so I wanted to publish that here.

Masks seem to do the best, conditioners do not keep my hair moist. This mask was changed last year, maybe the year before. The quality has just gone down, from great to too waxy to now drying with an awful, awful, terrible scent!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: To avoid wasting time and money and possibly damaging your hair, do research and find out your hair type first. If you have fine high porosity hair 3a-3b hair like me, this product may not work for you. I didn't know any of that when I brought it and it burned my scalp when I put it on and made my hair hard and brittle. Save yourself some headache, get to know your hair and don't reinvent the wheel if you already have products that work well for your hair. You may just need to follow a method like LOC, LCO, LAOC or LACO.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Best hair mask!!
Review: I had bought this hair mask at Walmart a few years ago and I recently ran out but couldn’t find it in any stores. Was so excited to find it on Amazon. The jar was shipped quickly and arrived without any spills. Love this hair mask. I use it at least once a week in place of my normal conditioner. I have very thin fine hair that can get a bit dry after coloring it every 3-4 weeks. I find this mask helps bring moisture back and makes my hair silky and shiny again. It smells amazing like almond and coconut!!!! The directions say you should apply it to wet hair, put on a shower cap, and apply heat. I have used it that way before when my hair felt very damaged or extremely dry however most of the time I use it to replace my daily conditioner and leave it on for at least 10 minutes while I am in the shower.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Amazing product
Review: I've tried many hair masks over the years and non have made me want to buy them again except this one. I've used black caster oil by itself for hair and lash growth, but because of the texture of my hair, the oil itself just made it super greasy, even after washing. I went looking for a mask that had it in it, since I thought the ingredient would help hydrate my hair, but since it wasn't the only thing, it would not make my hair greasy. I was right. I have a lot of hair, but it is wavy and fine. The mask helped the frizziness, while adding softness and shine without making it greasy. It makes my hair feel nice and healthy. I will definitely buy this product again when I run out.Also, the product has a nice smell, vs the smoky smell of just plain black caster oil.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz

I put it on after shampooing in the shower and wore a shower cap. Rinsed out after about 15 minutes and went to bed with wet hair. I awoke to soft wavy hair like it's supposed to be instead of a big poofy mess. And my hair smells great.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Winter Minnesota, product is poorly packaged, looks like someone opened it already
Review: It is middle of winter in Minnesota. Today's temp when I picked up my package was around 30 degrees fahrenheit. Upon opening the package, you can see on the product has leaked to the side just a bit, see picture 1 and 2 for reference. Therefore, the product should not look like it is melting out of the plastic tub that it is in.When you open the product, there's a noticeable dent inside the packaging, which makes it look like someone had opened it. If you turn the product around, you will notice that someone slipped the paper top back on using the product as a 'glue' to make the paper top stick back on, hence the product having the conditioner inside the top.I don't imagine buying at a local Target or Walmart will get this kind of poor and used-looking product. Will not order from this person again.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is my wife’s favorite hair treatment product. She’s been using it for about a year and it has made her hair healthier and minimized split ends.She uses it twice a week on just the ends. It really smooths and tames frizzies. However, since the mask is pretty rich in oil, it can make hair limp and oily if used in excess. My wife’s recommendation isto play with it and see what works for you.Applying it on the entire hair length didn’t work for her because she doesn’t like a very smooth look but applying it only on the ends has made her hair healthier and voluminous.The scent is very subtle and pleasant, so it’s a great product for those who are sensitive to strong scents too.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have naturally curly hair that I straighten, bleach, dye unnatural colors such as blue/purple/etc.. and my hair is generally very damaged. I normally can't even wear my curls naturally because they turn to pure frizz. This product allowed me to wear my hair natural and it was sooo soft! The best part is the price, I can actually afford this one, many products that actually do work on my hair are too expensive for me but this one WILL be re-ordered.4 Star Rating:This item arrived in good or great condition with no flaws or damage. It has been inspected for defect and has been cleared of any safety or quality concerns. This item is quality made and acceptable to purchase based on my experience with the product I was given._______________________________________________________________________________________________________**Please take a moment to let me know if my review has helped you in any way so I can keep track of my most helpful reviews. I hope you have a WONDERFUL experience with your product. ************************************************************************************************************************************I receive my products in exchange for my unbiased opinion and I take this responsibility seriously. I also pay Fed./State/Etc..Tax fees for every item I order so they are NOT "free" and a portion of my TEST ITEMS are donated to charities or individuals who need but can't afford them after they are tried out/tested by me & my household.**********************************************************************************************************************************

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My wife has been using this Caster Oil based hair masque on our daughter’s hair for the past couple years. Since my daughter’s hair is 4c texture, it can be a bit hard to manage at times.  To help manage and style it, my wife applies this product to our daughter’s hair then puts it up in a shower cap and applies heat for about a half hour. When it comes out, her hair is soft with a healthy sheen and is more easily styled and detangled. It doesn’t leave behind any greasy or oily residue either.One definite bonus for this product is that it smells pleasant. Caster oil is not known for smelling nice, and this bucks that trend completely. Since my daughter is young yet, something that smelled foul would likely not go over well.My daughter’s hair is about shoulder length, though it would be longer if stretched out. A 12 ounce jar of Shea Moisture Caster Oil lasts about 5 treatments before we have to get a new one.Bottom line:This is a great product for restoring moisture to hair. It helps soften hair and if you’re someone with course texture hair or hair that is kinky or frizzy, this will definitely help.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: Shea Moisture is one of my go-to brands. They make very effective products. This one is a must if you have dry or damaged hair. It's thick and rich. Your hair will feel so much better after using this mask. If you want to amp up the results, try using it as an overnight treatment applied to dry (not wet) hair. I highly recommend this mask.Thanks so much for taking the time to read this review. I hope the information that I've provided makes your decision a little easier.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Miracle worker!
Review: I recently put my hair through a lot of stress: I'd been dying it very dark brown for years and decided it was time to lighten it up. That unfortunately meant lots of bleach, then dye on top of it. After that process, my hair was left horribly damaged. I was seeing a lot of breakage, and it felt straw-like due to the dryness. I was excited to get to try this product out.For the price, the jar seems a bit on the small side, but it'll give you a solid several treatments based on your hair length (mine's about shoulder-length, and I used about a palm-full of the stuff). The scent is kind of earthy but slightly sweet; I found it pleasant. I left it on my hair for about five minutes, and my hair felt like silk when I washed it out. I noticed far less breakage when I combed through my hair and when I dried it, compared to my normal conditioner. My hair looked noticeably shinier and healthy. I did not experience any fading of my color (and red is notoriously a fast-fading color). It didn't get my hair totally back to normal, but I don't think any product really could with all the damage.Overall, I definitely recommend this product for dry, damaged, color-treated hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I'm surprised at just how impressed I've been by both of the things I've tried from this brand. I also have their coconut and hibiscus curl and style milk, and it's wonderful for applying to my wet hair before styling to keep down all of the frizzy bits throughout the day. It makes me look so much more professional, and the fragrance on that is amazing.This deep conditioner didn't seem to be doing much upon application. It felt like it was just sinking right into my hair and not actually making things slick to where I could comb the conditioner through my hair very well, my hair felt a little rough and unconditioned. However, upon letting it soak in and rinsing it out per the instructions, after my hair dried I was surprised and impressed to see just how smooth, soft, and extremely easy it was to brush.I'm a white girl with medium thickness, wavy hair down to my backside, and definitely with hair that long, I really appreciate a strong hit of moisture.The one thing that was not my favorite is that the fragrance is just a little bit strong for me. It smells a little bit like a cologne, and while it's not overtly masculine, there's something in the fragrance that goes a little bit that direction. However, once it dries, the fragrance is not that apparent. It reminds me a little bit of the Moroccanoil fragrance.Overall, I'm surprised at just how impressively this kept my hair smooth, conditioned, and free of tangles all day long.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Update: June,2020: after 3 months of use, I have to say it’s worth every penny! Especially in the summer heat and dryness, it is a god sent miracle....The hair is so silky and shiny after an application. Castor Oil has this property - making hair shiny and lustrous, enriches the natural color of your hair. IN addition, it also cools the body. SheaMoisture preparation captured all those benefits of Castor oil in a nice package.Only issue with this? It seems to remove any curls you may have. Other than that, this is a great product and is highly recommended...

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This masque is amazing. My fine hair has been through processing hell and it looks it. Dry, damaged and dull, it seemed beyond hope. But this masque saved me from a buzz cut. It is a fragrant creme. It can be used as a conditioner or as a deep conditioning treatment. As a conditioner apply to clean damp hair, leave on for five minutes and rinse thoroughly. As a deep conditioner it is left on for thirty minutes before rinsing. The results are impressive. Hair looks and feels soft and silky without being If you are prone to frizz, this masque will help tame it. weighed down.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a nice strengthening hair treatment. It comes in a nice little jar. When you open it you notice that it has a pleasant scent. You do need a good amount of this to cover your hair with it, more so than some others I have used in the past. It is actually fairly solid and not a soft more liquid kind of hair mask. It is free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, propylene, glycol, mineral oil and petroleum and was not tested on animals, all huge pluses in my eyes.You let this work into your hair for like 5 minutes. It rinses out with ease which is great. Your hair does feel nice and soft once it is dry and looks very good. The scent lingers over night but is gone in the morning. This is a very nice product that works.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I used this hair treatment by Shea Moisture this morning, then I rinsed, dried, and styled my hair. Right away, my husband commented on how nice my hair smelled and looked. I like that this masque is made from Fair Trade shea butter, and that it contains no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no propylene glycol, no mineral oil, and no petroleum. The company doesn’t use animal testing; another good thing in my book.My suggestion is to use the masque once a week, or once every other week, depending on the condition of your hair. I plan to use it twice a month. It’s very thick and you don’t need a lot, maybe a tablespoon full (I have long hair), so I expect this container to last a good, long time. I hope this review is helpful.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love SheaMositure’s coconut oil. So I figured to try more from their brand. I like this masque because, the texture is almost like whipped cream. So the consistency isn’t greasy, oil at all. I scooped out a handful amount then I applied on my hair after washing my hair throughly. This masque is moisturizing, does not leave greasy and oily feeling on your hair. I think I could use this masque as hair styling cream because how light weight feeling they are on my hair.I would recommend if you want something light weight and need moisture for your hair. If your hair is extremely damaged I would recommend SheaMositure’s coconut oil. I would give 4 stars because I feel like I can use the whole jar so quickly.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This deep conditioning hair mask does a great job of deep conditioning hair without leaving behind any greasy residue. I've tried several different deep conditioning treatments and this is the first one that didn't leave my hair limp and greasy feeling no matter how well I rinsed it. This stuff has the consistency of the original Noxema cold cream, it's thick but not heavy, has like a whipped feel to it.  I left it on for about 10 minutes and then rinsed it thoroughly. After treatment, my hair was super easy to comb through while wet.  When it dried, it was soft, smooth and frizz free. Surprisingly, it actually had some body and bounce to it too. This treatment has very little smell to it at all.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I’ve been using this product for ages, and I love it! I have extremely dry hair that gets knotted very easily. Although this is supposed to be used as a hair treatment, I use it as my regular conditioner every time I wash! If I don’t use it, I can’t brush through my hair. I apply after shampooing and leave it in for about 5 minutes & rinse. It makes my hair smooth, less frizzy and doesn’t weigh it down at all. It’s extremely moisturizing! Highly recommended!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have been a fan of Shea Moisture products for several months now, and this masque fits right in with the other high-quality, effective products in the line. I love that their products are more natural and made without sulfates, parabens, and other harmful chemicals that especially irritate my sensitive skin.This masque is great at making my hair softer, shinier, and healthier overall. I have naturally curly hair, which can get quite dry and brittle. Now, I know just how to combat that! A little of this masque goes a long way, and since I will be using it about once a week, this bottle will last me a long time. It smells great and has high-quality, recognizable ingredients, such as peppermint and shea butter. I would highly recommend it overall!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: OMG! Amazing!
Review: I have 4c hair, very thick hair coarse. I pre-poo by using coconut oil and conditioner to detangle my hair. I wait about a day or two to let it sit. Then I'll wash my hair.I usually wind up having to detangle again because it's still tangled. This time I didn't have to detangle it was so soft and easy to style into my protective hairstyle. I will be continuing to use this product. And it smells great. I sat under the dryer for a good 2 hours with a plastic cap and I added heat to the process. Great results!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Adds some much needed moisture to 4c hair. Leave it on overnight in a bonnet for even better results. Smells great and makes hair soft. Adds back some natural sheen as well so you dont have that full dry look. We do through this stuff like crazy and buy the regular conditioner as well. I use it lightly as a leave in for the little curly toddler as well and it keeps her hair in great shape - feels soft, adds definition, and gives her the moisture she needs. Love it!

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The product that arrived was not this one but another Shea moisture product, it was also smashed and cracked upon arrival. I did eventually go out and get one for myself and I hated it. The smell is really strong and almost smells like old playdough. It is very thick and coats my 4a hair nicely but there wasn't much difference in how my hair felt after a couple of weeks, it didn't feel any stronger yet it didn't feel weaker either. Aside from smell, which did linger for a while after washing it out, the product was just ok for me and my needs.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is my favorite product by far for my dry, damaged hair.  I color my hair every 8 weeks or so, and we love in Colorado where we don't get much humidity.  This had tremendously helped moisturize my hair without damaging the color.  I love the smell.  It has a great shea butter smell.  It doesn't leave your hair feeling greasy or filled with product.  Very light moisture and shine.  I will be buying this product for a long time.  A little goes a long way, even though it's a bit pricey.  A jar lasts me around 3-4 months, with shoulder length hair.  Helps get tangles as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Stinks
Review: Meh. It kinda just feels like I left any plain ol conditioner in my hair for 20m. Nothing fancy happened. No extra shine or better smoothness. I have very straight fine hair that i never style so I don’t have dry or problematic hair. Just weak and thin.It’s smells like playboh. Super. Gross. I really hate the smell of Shea this is a pass for me

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Fantastico
Review: This worked perfectly. Great subtle scent. It seemed like it maybe needed a smidge of mixing, but when moisturizing lots of hair, that’s totally fine. Ten out of ten would recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I do love this brand. It does what it's supposed to, and quite well. This strengthening mask is no different. It's very effective and leaves my hair feeling soft and strong and smelling great. The Jamaican Black Caster Oil is known to encourage shine and rapid hair growth, too - noticeable hair growth. It's fantastic and I highly recommend it if you want longer stronger shinier hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is supposed to be a conditioner but it makes my hair feel heavy and stiff. Everyone has a different type hair and my hair just doesn't approve of this conditioner.  To bad too, it has a great scent and it has a decent amount of product in the container.

Product: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque For Dry Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Mask 12 oz
Title: Smells amazing! Great for damaged ends.

Doesn't leave heavy residue behind. If you have thicker, dry hair, this would be amazing to use all over the head as a deep conditioner. Overall, it's a great product!

Title: VINE VOICE

Very disappointing. I had to use a regular conditioner after this just to detangle. This has a pretty strong fragrance that I found off putting.

My hair is color treated (shhhh!!!), middle aged (also shhhhhh!!!!), and I sometimes use the flat iron on it. And yet when I use this masque, the result is healthy, springy hair, with great shape and definition.It has great slip, so it’s easy to work it through. And the smell is pleasant, though not overly strong. Plus, I love that it is in a tub, so it is easy to get all of it out.

Title: NEVER AGAIN! WORST HAIR PRODUCT I'VE EVER PURCHASED!
Review: I am so dissatisfied with this product I could literally scream! In all my decades of life, I've used numerous products on my hair, and NEVER has a so-called "moisturizer" dried out and stiffened my hair. My strands were stuck to my head and so hard that I was afraid to brush them for fear of them breaking.To be fair, I applied this product twice so that I wasn't mistaking the results. There was nothing else in my hair, so the second time my strands stuck to my scalp, I knew it was the fault of this product. I'd even used this company's shampoo and conditioner, so this can't be blamed on any other product brand.During an economic crisis where slow shipping becomes the norm, this is THE WORSE time for failing products. I was happy this company hadn't overpriced its products too much like the majority of vultures tarnishing Amazon's great name. But, fair pricing is only a benefit IF the product works.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: Two Thumbs Up
Review: This product exceeded my expectations. My wife tried it first. She has long, curly hair and uses a variety of hair products, including gel, before she dries it with a hair dryer. She's used it several times and really likes how well it keeps her curls together. She also likes the scent.My hair is longish and wavy. I rarely use gel. Normally I just use shampoo and conditioner and then let my hair dry naturally.  However, after her great experience, I decided to try it. I am very happy with it and will probably use it daily now. I only used about a dime-size of lotion, and that was the perfect amount. My hair often gets a blown away look that I don't like, but this product eliminated that.This product is easy to use and works on curly and wavy hair. It's a Fair Trade product and has no sulfates, parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, mineral oil, and is cruelty free.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: Great Results!!
Review: This SheaMoisture Styling Lotion works amazingly well!! It is super easy to use and a little goes a long way. Then simply let it air dry and the result will be soft, defined, healthy looking natural curls. The scent is also very pleasant, similar to a light version of cocoa butter, definitely nothing overpowering.Great Product overall & I would highly recommend!

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: Smells like cake batter, deceptive label as far as ingredients
Review: I was truly surprised when I read the actual ingredient list for this styling lotion and consider the label and advertising to be deceptive.  The ingredients highlighted on the label, including castor oil, peppermint, shea butter, and apple cider vinegar, are all far down on the list.  The bottle even contains more fragrance than any of these token but much-heralded ingredients.  An ingredient list is not provided on Amazon at this time and the lists that I found elsewhere are apparently from a different formulation and the ingredients listed currently are slightly changed but much re-ordered.The rich lotion has an unusual cake batter fragrance that is not unpleasant but which is not a scent expected or particularly welcomed in a hair product.  On the other hand, it truly is a good moisturizer, especially for damaged hair, makes styling easier, and provides good hold once the hair is dry.  Just be careful not to use too much as it does affect the hair's texture and feel.The bottle is small at 8 fl. oz. or 237 ml, so it's not the best value around.Ingredients as listed on the bottle that I received:Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Beta Glucan, Inulin, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Inulin, Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend), Behentrimonium Chloride, Stearyl Dihydroxypropyldimonium Oligosaccharides, Behenyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glycerin (Vegetable), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Vinegar, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Panthenol, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Stearyl Alcohol, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Niacin, Yeast Extract, Citric Acid.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I put this product in my hair right after I washed it and I loved the result as it gave shine to my hair without feeling greasy. Unfortunately, the love I was feeling ended when my hair dried. Upon drying, it made my hair very crunchy which I didn’t like. However, I was able to remove most of the crunchiness by teasing my hair. My hair retained its shine after teasing it was which I love.I had to use quite a bit of product immediately after washing my hair, but required much less product on the days that follow. I only needed to apply the product on the ends & back of my hair which dries out more than normal since I don’t cover my hair at nights. However, the second of using this product, I noticed product buildup on my scalp which was a disappointment.It is best to wet the hair before applying as the product goes on white. I tried it in my son’s 4A hair and it was moisturizing to his hair though his hair was not shiny as mine. With his hair, I definitely noticed that the product didn’t dissolve in the hair if the hair was slightly damp. I had to basically wet the hair throughly to get the product to dissolve.After several days with the product in my hair, I could feel the moisture/grease in my hair to touch though my fingers didn’t look greasy. The scent isn’t overpowering at first but it become bothersome at nights laying in bed the longer you have it in the hair. By the third night of it being hair, I was truly bothered by its scent. I had to get up and wash my hair so I could go to bed & scents usually don’t bother me that much. Disclaimer: i mainly smelled the scent when I was laying down and the more product you placed in your hair, the stronger it became because night three scent was much stronger than the initial night of putting in the product or the night before. So if you’re very sensitive to smells, you definitely want to pass on this product. Overall, I can live with the crunchiness upon drying  because majority of the crunchiness can be removed after playing with the hair while still leaving my hair well moisturized & shiny! However, the scent would make me not purchase this item again as I found it too overpowering.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am a long time user of Shea Moisture products.  They are a brand I love and trust.  I used this Strengthen & Restore Styling Lotion for my son's hair.  It really moisturizes and defines his curls.  The scent though is very off putting.  He and I thought it smelled like play-doh.  We shrugged and he went on to school.  All his friends at school immediately had compliments for his hair.  Then they got closer and all of them clowned him for having playdoh scented hair (he's a 9th grader).  Great product but the fragrance is very odd!  I might add my own essential oils to this to offset the smell...as this is my only gripe with this product.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is great stuff, and it smells wonderful, too. I'm very sensitive to scents, but I like the smell of this.I don't actually use any heat products on my hair, so I was worried about this leaving behind a greasy feeling, but it didn't.I applied it and just brushed my hair like usual. Brushing helped to spread it throughout my hair, and it dried quickly. This lotion also made my hair softer and smoother.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I used this as a blow dry cream and it did an okay job smoothing without leaving me with sticky or greasy hair.  My main problem was the smell, it had a foul scent to me so I only used once

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz
Title: Great product
Review: This stying lotion is nice. It smells great and adds moisture to my hair. I am not sure how much it helps style my hair but it does add bounce.

Product: Sheamoisture Styling Lotion for Damaged Natural Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Silicone Free Hair Treatment 8 oz

The only issue I have is the smell is artificial. It smells like fake fruit. The smell bothers me a bit and took me a bit to get used to it. On the other hand, my sister loved the smell and uses it like perfume for her hair. It sprays kind of weird so I would recommend spraying your hand and then applying it to your hair.

It also offers the protection my hair craves. Today I decided to give myself a blowout and it turned out very good for being a self made job. Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Not what I was expecting
Review: This product was marketed as a heat protectant, even though the packaging says Anti-Breakage Spray (not heat protectant).  It makes the hair moist, like spraying it with water.  You really do need heat after that if your plan is to curl or flat iron.  Other heat protectant sprays have more of a dry oil base, and don't make the hair moist and frizzy beforehand.  I would definitely use it like a leave-in, but it doesn't work as a standalone heat protectant.

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Awful terrible product. Contains alcohol
Review: Horrible product. The number two ingredient is alcohol. It drys hair out!!!  Very damaging to hair. It’s trash.

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: eh.
Review: I bought this spray for heat protection and as a leave in for my very frizzy prone curly hair. Its Eh. Its not the best but for the price and availability its worth those days that you could care less about your hair but need to put some effort into it. When I used it to straighten my hair it didn't work any special magic. My hair was still frizzy. When I used it as a leave in it didn't work any magic then either. I would use this for protective styles and that's about it. It does smell great though...I added pictures of me with straight hair (mouse in the middle) to show the results.

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Changed formula
Review: I used to love this product until they renamed it and changed the formula. It used to have ACV but it is no longer listed on the bottle. The new formula made my hair look dull and very dry. I returned it but they told me to keep bottle but I’d get my money refunded. Not even they wanted it back. Lol. Not sure why they had to change the formula. I guess I need to go research an alternative heat protectant.

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Healthy Hair!
Review: I blow dry and straighten my hair every day and I was looking for something with castor oil for its wonderful benefits.  I decided to give this a try and I was not disappointed.  This stuff is amazing!  It leaves my hair so soft, healthy looking and way less hair on my brush after I straighten it.  I also don't need any hair products after I style my hair because it leaves it so beautiful.  I can't praise this product enough!

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Perfect for my 4C hair and fiance's 3C hair.
Review: This mouse is very moisturizing leaves my hair nice and soft. I actually use this for my wash n gos and for twist outs. After shampooing and conditioning I apply it on soaking wet hair with a little leave in conditioner. After finger combing through my hair I apply gel and then dry with a blow drier. I get very soft, moisturized bouncy curls.My fiance uses our spray bottle with water and JBCO to get his hair damp and then he runs the foam through his hair. he says it leaves his hair soft with little to no frizz. We'll definitely be purchasing again when we need another bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Love this brand

Product: SheaMoisture Anti-Breakage Spray, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Heat Protectant with Shea Butter, 8 Fl Oz
Title: Better
Review: I don't know why but my previous review is gone... so that's odd. I will have to check back to see if this one stays up. I wrote a bad review before so I am not sure if they had it removed or what but basically I received my first order opened without a cap and missing product/leaking/with dirty fingerprints, as if it had been used. I really liked that this has a high rating as far as safe ingredients for a heat protector for your hair, so I decided to send it back and get a new one sent back to me as a replacement despite this first impression not being so good.I am re-writing this review after receiving a replacement. Hopefully this one stays up. But basically the new one they sent back I like a lot more. Performance-wise, it seems to do the trick well as a heat protectant. It even works well as a leave-in conditioner if you are not heat styling your hair to give it more softness and to moisturize any frazzled ends. I applied to my hair where it is dry and it softened it immediately after running my fingers into it.My favorite part is definitely that they use all safe ingredients. It is also cruelty-free along with a few other environmentally conscious aspects.The only con is that this is NOT lightly scented whatsoever so if you are sensitive to fragrances, you may not be a fan. I'm not ordinarily a fan of highly fragranced things myself and I was thinking it would be a light shea butter with a bit of peppermint smell, since it says it has peppermint in it for some reason (on the back it states it has pepperming to make your "scalp tingle" - I don't know why they would need to do that as this is not a shampoo).But no, it doesn't even smell at all like peppermint. It instead has a strong sweet smell like sugary frosting on a cake. It indeed does smell very similar to cake frosting, if I had to give it a name. Kind of a strange scent for what the ingredients are. So, if you can't get past smelling distinctly like a birthday cake all day it may not be your thing. It wears off a little bit over the day but it really is quite strong at first and lingers on your hands even after washing them off. The strong and unusual smell for a heat protectant spray is why I knock off one star. Everything else seems great so far.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Helping My Hair so much ❤️
Review: As someone with hypothyroidism, I struggle badly with hair loss and thinning hair. I have tried several products that did absolutely nothing for me. But I am telling yall, I have only been using this product for a few weeks, and I can already see a difference. I have used this product about 5 times now, just a few pumps rubbed all over my scalp and left overnight- and my hair seems fuller, even regained a bit of my curl. I hope I will continue to get great results. Yes, it smells weird, but I could care less because after you wash, the smell is gone, and it really works.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil
Review: These products are very good. This oil in particular is the only one that works for me. It does not irritate my scalp; my hair follicles actually absorb the oil, rather than just sitting atop; it softens my hair whether my hair is wet or dry. The castor oil is very concentrated, so a little bit goes a long way. The scent may be too much for some, but I thankfully have never received a pungent batch. Shea Moisture also offers other types of oils as well. Recommended!

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Leaked during shipment, terrible smell
Review: I wanted to like this product. It leaked during shipment, but I wasn’t going to return it for that reason. The true reason I’m returning it is 1.) the pump DOES NOT work. It could be because mine was damaged in transit, but I’m wondering if I got an old/bad bottle because 2.) it REEKS like burnt peanuts. I will be unable to use this product, so I will be returning. I’m bummed because I love SHES moisture and really wanted this to work for me.
