Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This SheaMoisture 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil is authentic. It's thick , dark, and VERY moisturizing. This is the best skin moisturizer oil around in my opinion. I've used extra virgin coconut oil and rose hips. They work fine but Real Castor oil is a level above. This is worth every penny if you want soft moisturized skin that lasts all day. A little is all you need so this is economical as well. 5 stars.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I know people swear by Jamacian Black Castor Oil, but I'm just not sold.  I have seen any difference in my hair with products made with it or not.  However, I decided to give SheaMoisture 100% Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil, 1.6 Fluid Ounce a shot.  I have used a lot of SheaMoisture products.  Some with success while others just pure disaster.  I've used their oils before namely the Argan and Flax Seed.With this oil, I decided to put some in my spray bottle of water and the SheaMoisture Low Porosity Leave in Conditioner.  That is my go to for detangling and prep for twist outs.  Annnnnddddd, nothing.  Either JBCO is a sham or my hair just doesn't give a damn.  Because no difference for better or worse.  I will say my hair did not feel like straw like when I use SheaMoisture products that have the JBCO in it.  So, I either need to find a way to use JBCO to my hair's benefit (I'm running out of ideas) or it's just my hair hates it.  I would say overall the smell isn't too bad.  It's milder than flax seed, which was plus.  At close to $14, I know I can find this in a big box store (with a bullseye logo) for almost half that price.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have tried another castor oil which mentioned it was Jamaican and pure. That castor oil does not compare with this one. Because this one is actually real. I was surprised at the thickness of the consistency of the oil. Note that the oil is not actually black, but rather light brown. The other so-called Jamaican Castor oil i tried was not even brown. But anyway, i would totally get this oil if you are looking for the real thing.I apply this oil at nights on my eye brow; it  has a convenient dispensing on top so there will not be a mess. And this actually works for me - i apply it at night on my eyebrows, go to sleep, and wash it off in the morning with soap. My eyebrows look healthy, and empty and hairless spots are starting to grow, seriously. I am shocked.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Another reviewer said this doesn’t smell very good. I actually love the scent. It is light, earthy, and natural.It is very thick, so you will want to just use a squirt or two and mix it with lotion or cream. I mix it with my Skin Trip coconut lotion and I LOVE the combination.It does not irritate my dry, sensitive skin at all. In fact it is super-moisturizing.The only thing I don’t like is the bottle squirter. Since this is a really thick oil it doesn’t pump out very easily. I end up taking the top off and just pouring a couple drops into the palm of my hand, then mix with my Skin Trip lotion.This is a very affordable, super moisturizing oil. I love that it doesn’t have any synthetic perfume. It is so good for your face and really helps with smoothness and anti-wrinkles!! Love it!

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This Castor seed oil is not black but more of a brown slightly thick consistency compared to others.  The smell is very subtle.I discovered there are many uses for this oil.  You can use on eyelashes, you can mix with your natural hair care product and apply to your scalp or you can use it like how I do mostly and mix with with my Shea butter.  It works great to moisturize your skin. You can use to alleviate rash, itching dry skin, even use a little on eczema.  My friend's grandmother says it's good for muscle and pain aches as well.I even put a little in my diffuser.  But because of the slight thickness of it I didn't use a lot.If you're using on skin or hair I recommend using twice a day. Something as natural as this can only help and be healthy for you.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a nice oil. I have eczema and use pretty heavy moisturizers, but I have lighter ones that I like but that don't quite do the job of moisturizing adequately. I added about 1 tbsp of this to my lotion, shook it really well, and am getting much better moisture from it now. There is a scent but it's very subtle; it's like you would expect castor oil to smell. You can use it on your hair, according to the bottle, but it's too thick for my fine texture and I worry it could discolor my light hair (something my stylist warned me about). It makes for great cuticle oil, and is an all-around good product for when you need a shot of moisture. A little goes a long way, so I anticipate this will last quite awhile. Best of all, it doesn't irritate my extremely sensitive, picky skin.Recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I got this for my husband because it supposedly promotes hair growth, moisturizes dry hair, and strengthens it.  I haven't noticed any difference in his hair or scalp and neither has he.  It is perhaps slightly moisturizing his scalp but I'm not sure it's worth the cost for what it seems to do.  Especially since it smells terrible.  It smells a little like a dirty, dusty street where the dust meets asphalt on a hot day to combine for a truly unpleasant aroma.  I appreciate that it's 100% pure so should be working at it's best but I think it needs an added perfume or something to help combat the scent.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love using castor oil for my eye brows and eye lashes.  I apply this oil at night.  It enhanced growth of the eyebrows and eyelashes.  It is much better than Latisse or any other pharmaceutical products.  Not to mention that it is purely natural product, no artificial ingredients here.  A little pipette helps distribute just the right amount of oil.Castor oil is also great to use on face and it is especially good for hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have used numerous brands of JBCO so I can recognize quality.  This Shea Moisture 100% JBCO is definitely that.  It has that thickness and earthy smell you come to expect form real JBCO.  It comes in a pump top bottle, but oil is too thick to pump.  It just kind of spurts out every other pump which is very frustrating.  Eventually I just dumped the oil into a pointy nose application bottle.  Much better and easier to apply as well.  I use it for moisturizing my hair so I mix with coconut oil to cut the thickness.  Works great; no dry scalp here and very moisturized strands.  So definitely recommend, just use a different bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I’ve just started the regimen and find this product to be thick, but, soothing against the skin. I’m focusing on generating eyebrow hair regrowth. At nighttime, with a fresh face, have been applying a thin layer to my eyebrows, and am allowing the oil to absorb. In the morning, I am washing off before applying my make-up. While it is too early to tell, I am excited to watch the results of my eyebrow regrowth!

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I had high hopes for this product as my eyebrows are sparse due to hypothyroidism.  What I noticed is this is very sticky and a dark amber color.  I really didn't want to put it on my eyebrows as I figured it would stain the pillowcases.  I never got that far because I dropped it in the bathroom.Please be  careful if you decide to buy this.  It is glass, it shatters and is a mess to clean up - plus it cracked my bathroom tile.  I hope this works out better for you.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: My curls- love this crap.
Review: Wow ok, now I am probably mildly allergic to it because I sneeze badly with this in my hair. HOWEVER my hair LOVES this oil so imma keep using it. I mixed one pump into my hair mask- I don’t use this in my scalp for my scalp is already oily I just this mostly on my atcual hair. It makes my hair feel so smooth and very soft. My 3B curls feel very bouncy and light weight ever sense I tried this product. The smell is strong but that doesn’t bother me to much my curls are usually like a toddler there’s always something they want but with this- my curls are very happy.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Great product for thick hair
Review: This product is great for thick hair. I will say that my mother has thinner hair so back castor oil breaks her hair, but on my hair, it does nothing but moisturize my hair. It is great during the winter months when my hair is more dry than usual. The way I lie to use this product is to wash and condition my hair—the normal routine— and then rub this product between the palms of my hands and apply a thin layer to my hair while wet.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Put some of this on my lashes and they grew pretty well. I haven't tried this out on my hair because it's thick (somewhat a pain to remove the residue). It does moisturizes my skin really well.  This oil is a tad bit on the expensive side but you can tell that its the good stuff because of how thick it is. Overall, it's great and it definitely helped me out with my lashes.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Weird smell
Review: I ordered this in hopes of regrowing my practically bald eyebrows so I wouldn’t have to draw them on. The oil is a thick brown and the attached pump works well. However I just can’t get over the scent. I have a very sensitive sense of smell and the weird smoky, nutty scent might be mild but it lingers. This product isn’t for me. It reminds me too much of dirt and cigarettes.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: I love SheaMoisture Products
Review: This Jamaican Black Castor Oil does not disappoint.  I'm not a fan of the smell but I normally add it to my other oils that I make for my hair to help keep my hair moisturized. It's a pump action bottle but don't hold that against it, it's really good for your hair if you are natural shoot it's still good for your hair if you have a perm.  It's worth buying this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Scent is too peppery for me.....
Review: This is good if I mix a little bit in with my regular hand lotion (I have dry skin in the winter). Very thick consistency. A little goes a long way.I personally I didn’t like the smell. It had a peppery scent that I couldn’t stand unless it was masked by something else.Overall, good for moisture, not good for my nose.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Good quality
Review: Very moisturizing. I use regular castor oil on my body after I get out of the shower to moisturize. I’ve heard that black castor oil is even better for your skin and hair growing benefits, but it has not so nice scent that does go away mostly after applied. Would just use this type for small areas instead of all over. Seems to be good quality.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: A little goes a long way
Review: So far I've used this in my body wash,  lotion,  and shampoo.  It does add a little extra moisture to your routine.  Just remember a little goes a long way

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Castor Oil is generally a thicker oil. So I apply this during the night time so I can wash it out in the morning. I plan to use it for my eyelashes and hair. It will take a while to notice the difference but these natural oils doesn't have any negative effects compared to more man made solutions

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I got this to mix in with my body lotion and am not a fan. I use this brand’s haircare and love it, but I don’t like this at all. The smell is awful and my skin kind of started to itch after application and I hardly used any at all.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: It’s soothing to the dry scalp
Review: My hair tends to be quite dry and loses moisture quickly. I use this for scslp massaand to seal in moisture.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Extremely moisturizing, good value, and great product.
Review: Really like this product, it's one of the most moisturizing things I've ever used, and a little goes a LONG way. Definitely a good value as this bottle will last you a very very long time.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This works well! It’s not the best smell so I use with another product but it makes the bake very moisturized. It’s also very thick so a little goes a long way! Love that it has a pump nozzle.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: No cap!
Review: Would be good if it came with a cap like the picture! Can't even travel with this!

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: We are very pleased with how well this absorbs.  It is thick and feels like it won't absorb, but it does.  It comes in a nice glass bottle with a sturdy durable pump.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Product is very thick, even when used with a carrier lotion or oil. Mine came with a pump which is useless. Don't notice any difference that other similar products.

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: I definitely recommend 👌Wow
Review: Wow wow wow I always did love Jamaican black castor oil. But I must say this product I love how thick and how well It coats my hair 👌

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Must Buy‼️

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Absolutely love it
Review: I love it I use it for my son scar that he has now I love how it's keeping his skin nice and healthy and he loves it as well especially because it's so soft 💕

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Not moisturizing...

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: Give your hair body
Review: Like the thickness

Product: SheaMoisture Head To Toe Oil and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Skin Jamaican Black Castor Oil Paraben Free Hair Oil, Body Oil 1.8 oz
Title: IT'S THE REAL DEAL
Review: My hair is very moist,  the scent takes me back to my childhood days, it smells just like castor oil.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: 12 year dream came true
Review: So listen everyone, I don’t right reviews as often as I should since I rely on them so much, BUT I had to write a review for this product. It took me 12 years to find it. My 12 year old daughter has thick, coarse and curly hair that dries very easily. My hair is thick but soft and get weighed down by oil easily. This product works on both. I have done my own hair for years (since freshman year in college and I am now 38 years old), and I have a strict regimen. This product works really well with Mizani smooth guard conditioner. After shampooing with the black castor oil shampoo by Okay (rinse out), I use the Jamaican Black Castor Oil Okay conditioner and comb through with a big tooth comb. While it’s still in, I comb through the Mizani thermasmooth conditioner and Comb through with a skinny tooth comb (mixing conditioner doesn’t always go well but this makes the hair smooth like butter). I rinse out really well and towel dry. I add a small amount of Shea Moisture Strengthen and Restore Hair serum (This product) and comb through with big tooth comb. Then Use the Jinri 1876W Salon Dryer and blow dry straight with big tooth attachment. I part hair in fours and flat iron each section with Rusk CTC Technology flat iron. I curl with the flat iron, wrap and tie up. In the morning, her hair looks like she came straight from a celebrity salon. I am not tooting my horn as her stylist (I only do my hair and hers),  but I am excited I finally found the right mix for her hair after 12 years of experimenting. I am a BIG believer that there is no such thing as “good hair,” but all hair can be good when you adjust to the personality of a particular hair type. We all have the hair God wanted is to have. As you can tell I am over the moon and figured I could set someone else free!! I hope you are abundantly blessed by this review!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: But the SMELL YALL MMMM
Review: This stuff smells SO GOOD. I don’t even care about what it’s supposed to do for me I just love the way it smells! For the record, it does do great things for my hair. So shiny and soft, smooth and SMELLS SO GOOD. I can’t say it enough. Buy it.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: I use it on my flaky scalp. Smells amazing!
Review: Used it on my scalp in hopes it would help sooth itchiness and flaking from psoriasis and maybe promote some growth. The scent is so subtle and wonderful. I love the feeling of this oil. I think I've noticed significant reduction in itchiness and it's definitely made my hair feel nourished.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: The holy grail!
Review: I'm a young male that's been suffering from a receding hairline for almost 3 years now. I've always been told once that happens there is no hope of saving it because it's a genetic trait. But I want to tell any guys out there that's going through the same thing, this stuff will bring your hair back to life! After two in a half weeks of using this product, my hair is healthier looking and nearly back to the way it was before I started receding.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: This product is a miracle for hair
Review: This is absolutely the best product to help grow your hair long!I ordered my first bottle in 2018 and it lasted 2 years. Just ordered another bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Helped my hair grow back.
Review: I had a lot of hair loss a few years back when I got really sick. I was getting so embarrassed by how thin the front of my hair had gotten and regular castor oil was too thick for my hair. (Straight, slightly wavy, blond.) This stuff has been a miracle for me. My hairline has filled in and thickened up so much that my husband stops me and tells me how much thicker it's looking. This is great stuff and, when combined with a good diet and some vitamins, it makes a huge difference that I wasn't seeing from vitamins and diet alone.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Amazing Product Line
Review: La la la loooove this product line. I just started using this oil and it's amazing. I also use the shampoo, conditioner, deep conditioning mask AND the heat protectant spray. My hair has grown so much in a matter of about 3-4weeks. It's grown so much using this product line that my daughter asked if I had extensions in my hair. My hair is so soft and vibrant. I would recommend this to any and everyone!

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Yes, Yes, Yes!!
Review: I pair this oil with the deep conditioner by Shea and it has been a game changer for my hair. Highly recommended if your looking to add moister, shiny and softness !

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Smell Good Well Balanced
Review: I cannot live without it. This is the only castor oil product that is balanced between smelling good, not too thick yet it rejuvenate my hair and scalp. This is so good that you can sleep in and not to worry about grease on your pillow case. It smells so good that it actually promotes a restful sleep while repairing your hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Okay For Some
Review: I'm not sure if I just have a really dry scalp but this did not moisture my scalp at all. My curls seemed to like it through.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Safety Seal Missing
Review: Sooo I should have just kept moving after I saw multiple reviews regarding the safety seal. I wasn’t completely surprised that the safety seal is missing. It is a little concerning that this seems to be a trend and Amazon hasn’t pulled the product. Like what y’all doing that you need to remove the safety seal?!?

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Broken seal and weird stuff in bottle
Review: Seal was broken amd bottle contained dark brown spots and streaks throughout the bottle. I dont feel comfortable using it but it isnt eligible foe return nor replacement. What a waste of my time and money

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Hair loss/Breakage
Review: For starters, I am a woman of color. I have thick, curly, natural hair. Not too long ago, I allowed my beautician to color my hair. Unfortunately, it had over-processed, lots of Breakage & thinning. I then decided to manage my hair myself.  I have been using Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Shampoo & Conditioner Masque. It has truly restored my hair!!! So... I thought to try this oil. It truly RUINED my hair. I've always had thick curly edges. They are now thinning.  I am so upset!!!!! Starting my process completely over.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Love love this!
Review: I am loving this hair serum so much! It is light, absorbs easily into the scalp and doesn't leave my hair feeling oily and heavy. I have been using this serum regularly for almost a month now and am noticing a significant increase in shine and smoothness in my hair. My hair also seems to be growing a bit faster... not by a lot but noticing definite improvements!The only downside of this product is the relatively strong scent that generally puts me off... but I figure that's a small price to pay when the product is so good at what it is supposed to do.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: I love it!
Review: I absolutely love this stuff. I use the entire line with the shampoo, conditioner, hair masque, and this and it works wonders. My hair feels so nourished and moisturized without being oily. My hair has definitely grown longer too since I’ve been using it and taking hair growth pills. I relax my hair every month so I needed something to keep it from being damaged and brittle.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Little goes a long way !
Review: Just like all of my other Shea moisture products, smells great and leaves my hair feels and looking good.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: it WORKS!
Review: This stuff definitely works wonders. It also has a pretty nice smell to it which is great because you don't want to walk around with a head that wreaks. After a few weeks of using this product there was a noticeable difference.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: I received a bottle with the customer protection/anti-tamper seal punched through
Review: I received a bottle with the customer protection/anti-tamper seal punched through, you can still see the remnants of the seal are still there. Disappointing. I tried to return for replacement. Says not eligible for a return.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: I love this product
Review: I have very dry itchy scalp I've use products in the past and nothing seem to last more than a day and my scalp would be dry again the next day. This product wonderful I used it the first night I got it. First a little bit of this goes a very long way. Second it smells great. Third as I put the oil on my scalp the dryness and itchiness immediately was gone and stayed gone. My hair is soft and manageable now.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Broken protective seal
Review: I genuinely enjoy Shea Moisture products and use them regularly, I have some pretty curly hair. I was looking forward to trying this product but when I opened the bottle, twisting off the plastic top, the seal was already perforated and some of the oil spilled. Now the bottle is covered in it. It smells nice and I still want to try it, the ingredients list looks great, I just am not appreciating that the seal was already busted before I could even open it (without having it get everywhere).

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: OIL, OIL, OIL!!!
Review: Very oily.  Oil stains all over my pillows.  Will not be ordering this again.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Love it the oil, but....
Review: Just received my bottle and from the reviews I immediately did a THOROUGH inspection of the box and the bottle. There were no punctures anywhere! Everything was sealed as it’s supposed to be. Thank goodness! So I’m not sure if the issue of the tampered bottles was resolved or I just got lucky. Either way, I received mine in perfect condition and this feels amazing on my dry scalp. I plan to buy more!Update: 3/6/19So I felt lucky about got a bottle that wasn’t “tainted” and decided to quickly buy 2 more. Well, they were just delivered and BOTH bottles had the seal punctured and there were strange red bubbles in there. They had also spilled. Obviously I won’t be using either one of these!I want to point out something interesting. The first single bottle I ordered was fine. Packaged perfectly with the seal entact. That bottle was shipped from the fulfillment center in Colorado. The 2 extra bottles that I ordered after that shipped from the fulfillment center in Washington state. Now...as soon as I saw my 2 bottles were being shipped from a different fulfillment center I didn’t feel confident in receiving untampered with bottles. And sure enough, I didn’t receive good ones. I would be interested to know if others have this in common with their bad bottles coming out of Washington state?Anyway, I got lucky with the first bottle. Even though it’s half the price than in stores, I would rather pay more money to know that I’m getting an untampered with, quality product in a bottle.

But here's what I do like so far:  good smell,  not sticky (although it's really thin so I added pure organic castor oil to it) easily absorbable. I put it on either before bed or in the morning and it doesn't leave my hair oily,  only initially but then it absorbs. I also like that you only need to use a little at a time so it looks like it will last me a long time. I'll add that I'm using this line of products now including the shampoo,  conditioner, and edge control. Just fyi

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: So far so good
Review: So far so good. This was scheduled to arrive on the 18th and got it on the 13th... FAST. I initially thought this is to small for the price but a little goes a long way cause there's no need for a lot of this. A few drops is enough. I massaged my scalp with my finger tips but man this is making my scalp itch sooooo much when I first put it on but it's slowly going away. It's smells so good just like the masque. My hair does fell nice and soft after using this. I'm a black girl who's always been natural with 4b/c, mid back length hair. My hair is long and thick I just want it to get even longer cause it seem like the growth is stopping. I do have a lot of heat damage to my ends and a lot of shedding but no breakage fr but I trim hair every couple month. I plan to use it as a hot oil treatment on my hair wash days 1x weekly and 1x between just applying a few drops then massage.(I'll get back with an update with growth rate)

I have 3b/3c thick curls. I find this product to be more of an oil than a serum and while the product is good it's not what I want as looking for and too thick and also you don't get a lot of product for the price. This product reminds me of doo gel but at least I get more product in it. It is also mixed with several different oils and I realized I get go to my local beauty supply store and buy all those oils for cheap. Plus I would get way more product if I did it that way. In short there's nothing special about this product.

Title: A little goes a long way...
Review: I have naturally curly hair that is now just frizzy/wavy with out styling. I am Caucasian and my hair is naturally slightly coarse. I am currently repairing my hair from years of bleaching it. I L O V E this stuff. Just from one use (after my shower I put a bit on my damp ends/I don't blow dry my hair) I noticed a difference. A little honestly does go a long way, too much will make your hair oily. Unless you are trying to soak your hair in it (for an overnight thing) only use a bit to barely coat the ends of your hair. I am personally using it on my ends only since that is where the damage is and I don't want my roots to be weighed down. The smell is not overwhelming to me, but I am not scent sensitive at all. It has a very subtle sweet smell. Will be purchasing this again when ever I am out, but I think that will be awhile since I don't use too much.

Title: Basically, this is the only oil I'll be using from now on.
Review: It goes on smoothly, and has a nice viscosity. I use this on my moustache and beard, and it definitely does a good job. The mark of a good hair oil is absorption, and that's exactly what this does. After a few hours, my hair still feels moist, but the oily residue has mostly gone away, meaning that it has absorbed into skin and hair. The real proof is in the pudding however, and as far as growth rate and hair strength are concerned, I have noticed amazing improvements since using this oil. Basically, this is the only oil I'll be using from now on.

I have very dry scalp, especially in the winter time and I found this as the perfect product because it moisturizes the scalp and leaves the hair feeling soft. I actually bought the whole line of Shea Moisture with JBCO and it was WELL WORTH IT. My hair dresser even fell in love with it especially the masque. Just the smell alone will have you falling in love with this product. I highly recommend this product due to its natural/organic ingredients (NO PARABENS, NO SULFATES, NO MINERAL OIL) and the excellent results. I promise you won't be disappointed.

Title: Shea moisture gets an A+

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Great for hair growth
Review: I got the worst haircut of my life and desperately needed something to grow my hair out. I read about scalp massages for growth and used this. My hairdresser basically completely buzzed off the sides of my hair to the point where I looked bald, but within a week of using this (along with vitamins and good nutrition) for scalp massages the hair completely filled in.I also noticed that it helped with some sores on my scalp and healed them completely. This product has a noticeable smell (like vanilla, almond, peru balsam) which I happen to like, but it works well so the smell shouldn't be a factor in whether or not you use this product. If you want soft, strong, fast-growing hair and a healthy scalp definitely use this! Also you can get this cheaper elsewhere.. I got this at Ulta half off in a bogo deal.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Its not overly oily
Review: My hair is very dry especially in the winter when I really have trouble keeping my hair hydrated. I love this oil because it adds moisture to my hair without being overly oily which can be a problem for a lot of hair oils. I use this oil with my other SheaMoisture products and it has been working great so far.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: GREAT HAIR STRENGTHENING PRODUCT!
Review: Decided to try the Shea Moisture Jamaican Castor Oil based on the positive reviews.  I'm VERY pleased with the results!  My hair had become very dry, brittle, thinning, and breaking off due in part to prescription medications I had been taking for a severe skin allergic reaction,  as well as hormonal imbalances.  I'd previously tried numerous types of hair treatment products, as well as vitamins, but none seemed to stop the breakage, or the daily fall out.  But once I used this product, along with my usual haircare products, the breakage stopped within a couple days!  Amazingly my hair has finally started to grow back, thicker, and stronger than before!  I use the Serum daily (usually before bed, and cover with a satin sleep cap).  The scent is pleasant, with a tropical coconut-like aroma.  A little goes a long way, so recommend starting with small amounts, and massage into hair and scalp before combing and brushing through.  Leaves hair soft, and moisturized.  Would definitely recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Trying a new product.
Review: It smells good. Came with the SEAL OPEN as everyone claimed it did. But I used it. I use it before bed on my roots. It's oily as you apply but not greasy oily. By day the oil has absorbed and hair is easy to style. Makes my hair HEALTHY LOOKING. Only gave four stars so far cause I need to use longer to see if it does make hair grow. Will be back with update.

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Serum Oil for Damaged Hair Jamaican Black Castor Oil Hair Oil with Shea Butter 2 oz
Title: Good results

Title: Excellent and good ratings on EWG!
Review: I recently found out I have an autoimmune disease and I had been using the Shea Moisture High Porosity shampoo and conditioner.  The high-porosity conditioner had a few questionable ingredients in it (according to EWG) so I stopped using conditioner altogether (which I thought would be a huge disaster) and started using this hair oil (which has largely safe ingredients according to EWG) after shampooing instead and my very, very dry kinky-curly hair has looked and felt pretty great!

I guess I didn't pay attention to the size of the bottle as far as the fl oz in the bottle. Not sure if I'll be ordering this again, if the price remains or increases.

Title: Shampoo gone bad
Review: This product looked as if it’s gone bad, or mixed with something else or had some kind of a bad exposure; it was Cuddled and gel-like inside, instead of smooth In consistency. I’ve used this shampoo for 3yrs now, therefore I know everything about its smell, look and consistency.  I threw it all away. I’m disappointed. Quality control should be a must! There goes $20.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: My favorite shampoo delivered quickly to me.
Review: This shampoo leaves my 4c natural hair feeling soft and clean. The addition of the conditioner make my hair feel amazing. This size is 3.3 ounces more than sold in stores.The bigger plus is; I ordered this shampoo Monday late in the overnight and received it Wednesday afternoon. This is my favorite Shea Moisture shampoo which sells out quickly in stores near me, and I had it delivered to my house in one day.  No driving in the snow, slushing through the parking lot in a mask to stand 6 feet from people.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: STOP LOOKING BUY THIS!!!
Review: Yo. My hair has been through a lot; ironing daily, head and shoulders shampoo daily and no conditioner cause i thought it would make my hair oilier (yikes); bleach; tight slick bun hairstyles with hairspray; SUN IN; etc etc etc you name it bro. This shampoo is amazing my hair is usually oily af and i can’t last a day without washing it. it’s also super dry in the ends, but this shampoo is super moisturizing but doesn’t make my scalp oily or heavy it actually has lifted my dandruff and has kept it super clean now i can go at least 3 days no washing. Thank God. I also use it with the jamaican black mask as my conditioner and their leave in conditioner after i get out the shower. buy it and give it a few washes you’ll see and feel a difference.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: My new favorite!
Review: I tend to jump around when it comes to shampoo/conditioner, I get bored or tired of the smell. I really like this stuff. It smells great and leaves my hair soft after the shower. I color my hair regularly (red-constant up keep!) and use the blow drier and flat iron almost daily, so my hair needs something that can help repair the damage that I'm doing as well as keep the color nice. This whole line of products are amazing. definitely recommend!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Best shampoo I’ve ever used!
Review: This shampoo is amazing. I used to have the greasiest hair, and I washed it every day. Now I can wash it every other (or even every third) day, and it looks great. Soft and shiny, not frizzy or greasy or staticky. Love the nice thick lather, and it doesn’t smell weird. Plus, it’s natural - nothing toxic. Love it so much that I’ve brought several other products from this brand for myself and my kids. Great stuff!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Excelente Sulfate free clarifying Shampoo for weekly use!
Review: This is my 2nd time using this shampoo but the 1st time ordering from this source (1st batched lasted several months maybe 5-6)! The package came on time, works very well, lathers a lot on the 2nd wash (I wash my hair twice in the shower), and leaves my hair feeling clean fresh (without buildup), and smooth.My curl pattern is Type 4b, my hair texture is silky and soft, the density is thick, my individual hair strands are strong and resistant to breakage, my porosity is medium to low.Hope this helps!!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: My god these smell and feel good
Review: Only used it for 2 days and it’s a huge improvement over my head and shoulders 2-1. Leave my hair extremely soft almost like I had a relaxer in my hair. It was referred to me by a Uber drive whom had impressively clean and healthy looking beard. I bought this along with the leave in conditioner which is equally impressive.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Best Ever!
Review: I have to say that this is the best shampoo (and the conditioners-leave in and wash out-are too!) I have ever found. The price is VERY reasonable for a quality hair product(s)! My first purchase was for the trio of products and I found that there is so much of the leave in (which I use each time I wash my hair along with the wash out conditioner) conditioner that my second and third purchases were for additional bottles of the shampoo and wash out conditioner as the leave in looks like it will last longer. You don't need much to thoroughly wash your hair and it lathers up really well. For me another plus is the scent....being allergic to flowery scents it is sometimes hard to find hair products that don't give me a headache within minutes of using. This one has a very earthy scent. I just cannot say enough about the Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore products. Even my salon stylist was impressed at how much moisture my hair had. Being over 65 and having gray hair as well as "chemo" damaged hair after cancer these products have done wonders for the silkiness of my hair. Highly recommended to anyone!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: saved my thinning hair
Review: I have very fine, thinning, hair with no body that is also super greasy on the top and dry and frizzy on the ends. I gave up normal shampoos with sulfates in them and switched to this. Wow. My hair got really soft after the first few uses, and then it began to grow! It's not tangly anymore when I brush it. 2 different people noticed in the same week that my hair actually looked healthy. My mom, who I hadn't seen in awhile came for a visit and asked what in the world I did to my hair and so I let her use some and she liked it and went out and bought her own. Very good stuff.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Absolutely in love with this product!!!
Review: This shampoo has changed my life! Lol the smell is absolutely amazing and the way it leaves your scalp feeling clean and amazing.  I tend to have dry itchy scalp and this shampoo superseded my expectations on calming that issue down. I have tried all kinds of over-the-counter medicated shampoo’s but this one is the real deal and it leaves your hair with the best smell.  I get so many compliments on how good my hair smells when people hug me

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Best shampoo in the world
Review: This shampoo is amazing. I have been using it since 2013 (ish) when I started transitioning from relaxed to natural hair. It worked perfectly in my relaxed hair and then in my half natural/half relaxed hair, and now in my type 3C curly hair. It cleans my scalp and I do believe it helped me grow my hair faster. Every time I try to change it for another shampoo (to try new stuff), I end up buying this one again.The only thing that is not PERFECT about this shampoo, is the smell. I mean, it has a light scent that does not stay on hair at all, but I think it could smell a tiny bit better. But, yeah, I totally recommend it to everyone.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: My second order and more to come
Review: This is my second order and this time I got two bottles. I have thinning hair and researched the ingredients to stop hair loss and maybe, just maybe, grow some of it back. I don't do the pills, ointments and what have you that has major side effects. I don't claim this shampoo will grow your hair so fast that you can braid it or get dreads and go rasta fa ri!...lolWhat I do know from using it is that I don't see my hair follicles abnormally all over the sink or tub drain. my hair smells good, soft and manageable, not weighed down, and noticeably "fuller".Best thing of all, no side effects...lolI'll keep using it.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Growth but not strength
Review: (wife here) I bought this product after trying EVERYTHING else that's out on the market. After over 10 yrs, this is honestly the only product that has helped my baby fine/incredibly thin hair grow! However, it does nothing to help strengthen it or reduce the oiliness of my hair/scalp but I am still impressed. Although it still falls out at the same unhealthy rate , it has grown faster than it ever has before and for me, that's more than I could've hoped for.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Your hair will love this shampoo!
Review: I love this shampoo and so does my baby fine hair. I gave this shampoo away as a Christmas gift to my family and friends and everyone has asked where I got it so they can repurchase.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Saved my hair
Review: My hair has a naturally-difficult coarse texture prone to fairy knots, dryness, and breakage. This has saved my hair as it has none of the harsh ingredients of other shampoos and is very smoothing/moisturizing.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Returned it
Review: I was looking forward to using this new shampoo since it had some good reviews. One of the bottles came like this and not sure if it’s normal but the other one did not look like that. Returned and purchased something different.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Luxurious shampoo!
Review: My sister introduced me to this product. I love the great lather and great results! Hair is soft and clean. No build up! Works well with Shea Moisture conditioner and other after shampoo products!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: The first time I used it I thought it was wonderful for my hair
Review: I have to warn anyone with eczema... do not use this shampoo!The first time I used it I thought it was wonderful for my hair.The second time, it felt like fire on my scalp!  It also caused my eczemato flare up as well.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: This really does help your hair grow!
Review: I love this shampoo! It has helped my hair grow and keeps it much less frizzy. I love the smell, and the rich lather.  If you're looking for something to help thinning hair, this is the answer.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Good for curly hair prone to dryness
Review: I have fine, fairly wavy hair that will curl naturally under the right circumstances. This shampoo helps keep my hair moisturized enough to bring out that texture. It has a really subtle, pleasant vanilla-y scent. There is a bit of separation of ingredients but it doesn't make the shampoo any less effective. I just shake it a bit before applying. I usually brand hop for hair products but I love this stuff!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Great Shampoo
Review: My daughter wanted to buy this shampoo.  I didn't have high hopes but was pleasantly surprised.  I saw a difference in my hair after the first washing.  I like it.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Love this!
Review: This is by far my favorite shampoo. It leaves my dry bleached hair soft and very shiny. It smells great, and I love the fact that it doesn't have nasty chemicals like regular shampoos. Castor oil promotes hair growth, I didn't but it specifically for this purpose but maybe it does help. I love that it's a 2 pack of the larger sized bottles, I used to buy it at drugstores and the price there for 1 small bottle was around $12-$14, so this is a great deal.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Good product
Review: Ve r y satisfied with the Jamaican Black Castol shampoos. I love the size 16 oz. Wish it came in this size always. The quality of the shampoo is really great, especially for my hair. My hair is very dry and damaged. It gives moisture to my hair, it softens and helps with breakage. You just have to keep using it and it gradually stops the breakage.I have always used Jamaican Black Castol, but it only comes in 13 oz. which doesn't last. Hopefully they'll start keeping the 16 oz.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Very good to stop hair loss
Review: I used this shampoo and conditioner before, and I just bought these as extra.These shampoo and conditioner really help to reduce my hair from falling out. I strongly recommend them for anyone suffering from thin hair/hair loss

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)

I had eczema on the back of my head for years and could not find a product that diminished/eliminated it, but this stuff has done the job. Love it!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)

Title: Excellent product!

My hair is no longer falling out, I'm seeing lots of new growth and it doesn't leave my hair oily or heavy at all! I also use the leave in conditioner and hands down, these are the best products out there. I don't know how it does what it does but I love it and I'll never use anything else!

The newer formula does not have shea butter so hopefully I can use the entire new bottle.Very impressed with the quality of the shampoo and it's ease of use. Having used this shampoo for a few months, there is noticeably less hair falling out in the shower and in my hairbrush. I used to have a streak of gray hair on one side of my head and i noticed that it isnt gray anymore. I can't attribute it to any other changes in my normal routine, so it is most likely the dark shampoo.

Title: I'm actually quite disappointed. I tried this before a few years ago ...
Review: I'm actually quite disappointed. I tried this before a few years ago and found out I was allergic to the fragrance. Deciding to give the product another shot, I read the ingredients list and saw that the fragrance was changed to an "essential oil blend". I'm sorry but I haven't encountered an essential oil that I'm allergic to yet so there must be an artificial fragrance in that bottle because my allergic reaction was even worse this time around. It makes me really sad that I can't use something that works because I'm allergic to most fragrances in hair products. I hoped that because it was "natural fragrance" I'd be okay.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Pretty Good, But Tangles My Hair Badly
Review: I have 55 year old fine African-America, medium lengthen hair that is usually naturally curly from roots to ends when wet; fine, thin, light and feathery after pressing with straightening comb.  I also have vitiligo on my scalp.  Before, I used Suave for years.  After shampooing & conditioning with Suave, it relaxed some of the ends of my strands, curls went limp and straight.  Enough said.  After using this shampoo and conditioner for about 3 months, I noticed that it helped with hair growth especially if I kept my ends clipped about once a month.  I also feel as if it is thickening my hair shaft I think.  I noticed that the texture of my hair was restored to its original curly-at-the-ends-when-wet state.  That one surprised me!  What I do NOT like about the shampoo is that it leaves my hair incredibly tangled--so tangled that even with the gentlest teasing with my fingers while being conditioned with same brand, it pulls out a lot of hair.  A lot!  I hurts too much to use a wide-tooth detangling comb.  In fact, I am beginning to feel concerned about further use of the shampoo.  I'm going to try the same brand but their detangling shampoo.  Overall, I do recommend this brand.  Although I recommend it for black hair, use the shampoo with caution.  Perhaps the shampoo was  a little too strong for my hair type.  I will try their other shampoo products before totally giving up.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Not As Special As It Seems
Review: I liked this shampoo, but I didn't love it. The thing is: this shampoo, at least to me, isn't designed to be used regularly. With it having apple cider vinegar in it, this is great as a once-a-month or bi-weekly wash to help rid of excessive scalp buildup, so by nature, it will be drying. But use it on a more regular basis, and it's only going to be counterproductive. That's not the reason why I'm giving it a "meh" rating though: I think in general I just wasn't impressed by it overall. I wish it had more of a smell, and that it did more as promised on the label. While it's a great at "stripping" the scalp and hair, it doesn't really do much else, honestly. And since this is very watery, it also doesn't last that long, either.Maybe some will love it, and maybe others can use this regularly without problems, but I'd only stick to this once a month or bi-weekly. When I run out of this stuff, I'm not really planning on buying more, though. This shampoo is just okay, nothing as special as you'd hope.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Great shampoo for flaky scalp!
Review: I have only been using Shea Moisture shampoos for years now! It seems to be the only brand that is cruelty free, sulfate free, mostly natural ingredients, all while not making my scalp too dry. I have an especially sensitive scalp when it comes to shampoo. For a while, I was using the Shea Moisture dandruff shampoo, which worked pretty well. I wanted to find something with a bit more of a pleasing scent, though, so I picked this up to try it. Maybe it's because of the apple cider vinegar in it, but it really seems to do the trick! I don't have dryness or itchy scalp after using it regularly. It still get a tiny bit a flaking, but it's noticeably diminished compared to what it used to be. I switch off sometimes between this and the dandruff shampoo as a preventative. This is pretty much my go-to shampoo now!

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)

Review: This product is excellent! I will continue to purchase. It actually does what it says it would do. I recommend this product. Trust me you will not be disappointed! This goes for the shampoo and the conditioner. I'm about to purchase the serum as well.

Title: Skincare Secret!!!
Review: I have an oily scalp and oily skin. I find this just so-so as a shampoo. But as a face wash - HOLY COW. I have a small face scrubbing brush I keep in the shower. I use this shampoo and that brush and my skin has never been better. My skin is soft, clear, and smooth. Skip using it on your scalp and use it on your face.

Been using this off & on for maybe a year and it’s awesome. I notice it’s thinner than it used to be, and I read about formulas changing...I don’t know if it’s true but it seems to still work fine for me

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Holy grail shampoo
Review: This shampoo has been a game changer for me. I have thin wavy hair, and I had some hair loss around my temples from a medication that I was terrified was going to be permanent. Then I stumbled across this hair line, and started using the shampoo, conditioner, and mask and WOW it has made such a huge difference in my hair health AND my edges are growing back!!! This isn’t like the type of shampoo/conditioner where you use it once and you have instantly soft hair - this is the kind where after a few weeks your hair is actually healthier, smoother, and more manageable. Not instant gratification but actual change. I can’t recommend this stuff enough

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: This shampoo is great. It has a nice
Review: This shampoo is great. It has a nice, subtle vanilla-y scent and does not dry out my hair at all. It also does not dry out my (very) sensitive scalp. I'm not sure it's making my hair grow faster, but I definitely lose less hair in the shower. I have thinner hair that is very curly and it does not weigh it down and lathers nicely.

Product: Shea Moisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo w/ Shea Butter, Peppermint, & Apple Cider Vinegar 16.3 fl oz. (482ml) (2 Pack)
Title: Something wrong with formula
Review: I used to LOVE this stuff. I raved and recommended it to others for how it helped my hair grow in thick. Last two deliveries have had solid chunks of what I’m assuming is the black soap. No matter how hard I shake it up, I just have clear lighter shampoo with big brown chunks. Doesn’t distribute evenly. I also use this on my dog and it helped calm his skin and regrow hair, but the chunks don’t mix when I rub into his coat. Maybe the Amazon storage facility isn’t climate controlled. When I can find this brand at Walgreens, it doesn’t seem to have this same problem. Will be canceling auto-delivery. Buy this at a local place, if you can.
